                <XMRef idref="S2.p35.m16.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p35.m16.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p35.m16.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:Lm3" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 2.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 2.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 2.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}" text="H _ 2" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are finitely generated factor-free
subgroups of the free product <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="S(H_{1},H_{2})\neq\varnothing" text="S * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="empty-set" name="varnothing" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then the connected components of the graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi(H_{1},H_{2})" text="Psi * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are core graphs <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi(H_{1}\cap sH_{2}s^{-1})" text="Psi * (H _ 1 intersection s * H _ 2 * s ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}\cap sH_{2}s^{-1}" text="H _ 1 intersection s * H _ 2 * s ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="s\in S(H_{1},H_{2})" text="s element-of S * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m8.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m8.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m8.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In particular,
<Math mode="inline" tex="\bar{\mathrm{r}}(H_{1},H_{2}):=\sum_{s\in S(H_{1},H_{2})}\bar{\mathrm{r}}(H_{1%&#10;}\cap sH_{2}s^{-1})=-\chi(\Psi(H_{1},H_{2}))" text="bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2) assign (sum _ (s element-of S * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)))@(bar@(r) * (H _ 1 intersection s * H _ 2 * s ^ (- 1))) = - chi * Psi * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>

                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>

                          <XMDual>

      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>

        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1}):=-\chi(Y_{1})&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * Y _ 1 assign - chi * Y _ 1 &gt; 0" xml:id="S3.p1.m8">
          <XMath>

              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m8.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m8.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
In particular, <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}" text="Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> has no vertices of degree 1 and <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}" text="Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> contains a vertex of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="&gt;2" text="absent &gt; 2" xml:id="S3.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
              <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p2">

          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varphi}(e){\varphi}(f)^{-1}=ab^{-1}" text="varphi * e * varphi * f ^ (- 1) = a * b ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S3.p2.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m22.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m22.1">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m22.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m22.2">f</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S3.p2.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, see an example depicted in Fig. 3.1.
It is easy to see that the relation <Math mode="inline" tex="{\sim}_{{\Omega}_{T}}" text="similar-to _ Omega _ T" xml:id="S3.p2.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp meaning="similar-to" role="RELOP">
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an equivalence one.</p>
    </para>
    <ERROR class="ltx_centering undefined">{tikzpicture}</ERROR>

                      <XMDual xml:id="S3.p4.m3.3.1">
                        <XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                </XMApp>

            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denote the cardinality of <Math mode="inline" tex="[(a,u)]_{{\sim}_{{\Omega}_{T}}}" text="(delimited-[]@(open-interval@(a, u))) _ similar-to _ Omega _ T" xml:id="S3.p4.m4">

        </Math> is <text font="italic">associated</text> with a secondary vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="w\in V_{S}Y_{1}" text="w element-of V _ S * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p4.m6">

      <p>for every equivalence class <Math mode="inline" tex="[(a,u)]_{{\sim}_{{\Omega}_{T}}}" text="(delimited-[]@(open-interval@(a, u))) _ similar-to _ Omega _ T" xml:id="S3.p5.m4">

          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>

      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex3">
        <Math mode="display" tex="N_{\alpha}({\Omega}_{T})=\sum(|[(a,u)]_{{\sim}_{{\Omega}_{T}}}|-2)\leq|T|\cdot%&#10;|V_{P}Y_{1}|-2r\leq(|T|-2)|V_{P}Y_{1}|." text="N _ alpha * Omega _ T = sum@(absolute-value@((delimited-[]@(open-interval@(a, u))) _ similar-to _ Omega _ T) - 2) less= absolute-value@(T) cdot absolute-value@(V _ P * Y _ 1) - 2 * r less= (absolute-value@(T) - 2) * absolute-value@(V _ P * Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.5"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.5">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.5.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.5.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.5.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.5.2.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.5.2.1">

                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>

                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>

                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.1"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.2"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                <XMApp meaning="similar-to" role="RELOP">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

      </equation>
      <p>On the other hand, if <Math mode="inline" tex="r\leq|V_{P}Y_{1}|" text="r less= absolute-value@(V _ P * Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p7.m7">
          <XMath>

          </XMath>
        </Math>, then it follows from (<ref labelref="LABEL:cd1"/>) and (<ref labelref="LABEL:Nal"/>) that</p>

      <p>Thus, in any case, it is shown that</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:cd2" xml:id="S3.E3">
        <tags>
          <tag>(3.3)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3.3</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="N_{\alpha}({\Omega}_{T})\leq(|T|-2)|V_{P}Y_{1}|." text="N _ alpha * Omega _ T less= (absolute-value@(T) - 2) * absolute-value@(V _ P * Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.E3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.E3.m1.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.E3.m1.2.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.2.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.E3.m1.2.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E3.m1.1">T</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.2.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.E3.m1.2.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p8">
      <p>For every <Math mode="inline" tex="A\in S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="A element-of S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p8.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p8.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p8.m1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
we consider a variable <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{A}" text="x _ A" xml:id="S3.p8.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We also introduce a special variable <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{s}" text="x _ s" xml:id="S3.p8.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Now we will define a system of linear inequalities in these variables.
For every <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p8.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

      <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=2" text="alpha = 2" xml:id="S3.p8.m14">

    <para xml:id="S3.p9">
      <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S3.p9.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be an integer and <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p9.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m2.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m2.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p9.m2.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denote the system of linear inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqa"/>)–(<ref labelref="LABEL:inqb"/>) over all <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p9.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-admissible functions <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{T}" text="Omega _ T" xml:id="S3.p9.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{T}\in\Omega(Y_{1},{\alpha})" text="Omega _ T element-of Omega * open-interval@(Y _ 1, alpha)" xml:id="S3.p9.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m5.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m5.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p9.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=1,2" text="alpha = list@(1, 2)" xml:id="S3.p9.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m6.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p9.m6.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p9.m6.2">2</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Since the set <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{2}(G_{\alpha})" text="S _ 2 * G _ alpha" xml:id="S3.p9.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m7.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is in general infinite (unless <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S3.p9.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is finite) and the set <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p9.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m9.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m9.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is finite (because <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}" text="Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p9.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is finite), it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p9.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m11.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m11.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p9.m11.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m11.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an infinite system of linear inequalities with integer coefficients over a finite set of variables <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{A},A\in S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="list@(x _ A, A) element-of S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p9.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>

                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m12.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m12.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m12.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p9.m12.1">A</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m12.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p9.m12.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{s}" text="x _ s" xml:id="S3.p9.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p10">

        </Math>, as follows from inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:cd2"/>). Also, the number of subsets <Math mode="inline" tex="A\subseteq V_{P}Y_{1}" text="A subset-of-or-equals V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p10.m16">

          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is finite and the total number of occurrences of such variables <Math mode="inline" tex="\pm x_{A}" text="plus-or-minus x _ A" xml:id="S3.p10.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
              <XMApp>

        </Math>
in <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S3.p10.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="k=|T|\leq d" text="k = absolute-value@(T) less= d" xml:id="S3.p10.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m21.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m21.1">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Therefore, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p10.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m22.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m22.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p10.m22.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p10.m22.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a finite system of linear inequalities and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]=\cup_{d=3}^{\infty}\operatorname{\textsf{%&#10;SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1) = (union _ (d = 3)) ^ infinity ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p10.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m23.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m23.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p10.m23.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p10.m23.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="union" role="ADDOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp meaning="union" role="ADDOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m23.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m23.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p10.m23.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p10.m23.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>

                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p13.m8.2">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p13.m8.3">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Define <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{u}:=\{{\varphi}(e_{1}),\dots,{\varphi}(e_{\ell})\}" text="T _ u assign set@(varphi * e _ 1, dots, varphi * e _ ell)" xml:id="S3.p13.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m9.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m9.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m9.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m9.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m9.2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m9.2.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p13.m9.1">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m9.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m9.3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m9.3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Clearly, <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{u}\subseteq S_{2}(G_{\alpha})" text="T _ u subset-of-or-equals S _ 2 * G _ alpha" xml:id="S3.p13.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m10.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Define the sets <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{j}:=\tau_{1}\tau_{2}^{-1}(v_{j})\subseteq V_{P}Y_{1}" text="A _ j assign tau _ 1 * (tau _ 2) ^ (- 1) * v _ j subset-of-or-equals V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p13.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m11.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="j=1,\dots,\ell" text="j = list@(1, dots, ell)" xml:id="S3.p13.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m12.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m12.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m12.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p13.m12.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p13.m12.2">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p13.m12.3">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and consider the function</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex5">
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\Omega}_{T_{u}}:T_{u}\to S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="Omega _ T _ u colon T _ u to S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex5.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>so that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Omega}_{T_{u}}({\varphi}(e_{j}))=A_{j}" text="Omega _ T _ u * varphi * e _ j = A _ j" xml:id="S3.p13.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m13.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m13.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m13.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p14">
      <p>It is easy to check that <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{T_{u}}" text="Omega _ T _ u" xml:id="S3.p14.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p14.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-admissible.
Since every <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p14.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-admissible function <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega\in\Omega(Y_{1},{\alpha})" text="Omega element-of Omega * open-interval@(Y _ 1, alpha)" xml:id="S3.p14.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m4.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m4.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p14.m4.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m4.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
gives rise to an inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqa"/>) if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=1" text="alpha = 1" xml:id="S3.p14.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> or to an inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqb"/>) if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=2" text="alpha = 2" xml:id="S3.p14.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and every
secondary vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in V_{S}Y_{2}" text="u element-of V _ S * Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p14.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of type <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p14.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> defines, as indicated above, an <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p14.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-admissible function <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{T_{u}}" text="Omega _ T _ u" xml:id="S3.p14.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, it follows that every <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in V_{S}Y_{2}" text="u element-of V _ S * Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p14.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is mapped to a certain inequality
of the system <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p14.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m12.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m12.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p14.m12.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p14.m12.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, denoted <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(u)" text="([inq] _ S)@(u)" xml:id="S3.p14.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m13.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m13.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p14.m13.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m13.1">u</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Thus we obtain a function</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex6">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}:V_{S}Y_{2}\to\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[inq] _ S colon V _ S * Y _ 2 to [SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.Ex6.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex6.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex6.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Ex6.m1.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex6.m1.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>defined from the set <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{S}Y_{2}" text="V _ S * Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p14.m14">

    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p16">
        <p>The inclusion <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(V_{S}Y_{2})\subseteq\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}%&#10;}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([inq] _ S)@(V _ S * Y _ 2) subset-of-or-equals ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p16.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p16.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p16.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p16.m1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p16.m1.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p16.m1.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p16.m1.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p16.m1.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is evident from the definitions.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p17">
        <p>Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in V_{P}Y_{2}" text="v element-of V _ P * Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p17.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and let
<Math mode="inline" tex="e_{1}" text="e _ 1" xml:id="S3.p17.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{2}" text="e _ 2" xml:id="S3.p17.m3">
            <XMath>

          </Math> be the edges such that

        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex8">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{u\in V_{S}Y_{2}}\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(u)^{L}," xml:id="S3.Ex8.m1">
            <XMath>

                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
