                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>before any cancelations are made, can be paired down by using primary vertices of <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p17.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as indicated above. Since every secondary vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="u" text="u" xml:id="S3.p17.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p17.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contributes <Math mode="inline" tex="-(\deg u-2)" text="- degree@(u) - 2" xml:id="S3.p17.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p17.m22.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p17.m22.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to the coefficient of <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{s}" text="x _ s" xml:id="S3.p17.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{u\in V_{S}Y_{2}}\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(u)^{L}" xml:id="S3.p17.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p17.m24.1">u</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:add1a" xml:id="S3.E7">
          <tags>

        <p>the first equality of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem1"/> becomes evident. The second equality follows from
the analogous to (<ref labelref="LABEL:add1a"/>) formula</p>

        <p>and from the definition (<ref labelref="LABEL:Nal"/>) of numbers <Math mode="inline" tex="N_{\alpha}(\Omega(u))" text="N _ alpha * Omega * u" xml:id="S3.p17.m25">

          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S3.p18">
      <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="A=\{a_{1},\dots,a_{n}\}" text="A = set@(a _ 1, dots, a _ n)" xml:id="S3.p18.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m1.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p18.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p18.m1.1">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p18.m1.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a finite set. A <text font="italic">combination with repetitions</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p18.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p18.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, which we denote <Math mode="inline" tex="B=[[b_{1},\dots,b_{m}]]" text="B = delimited-[]@(list@(b _ 1, dots, b _ m))" xml:id="S3.p18.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S3.p18.m4.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m4.2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m4.2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p18.m4.2.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p18.m4.1">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p18.m4.2.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, is a finite unordered collection of multiple copies of elements of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p18.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="b_{i}\in A" text="b _ i element-of A" xml:id="S3.p18.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="b_{i}=b_{j}" text="b _ i = b _ j" xml:id="S3.p18.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is possible for <Math mode="inline" tex="i\neq j" text="i not-equals j" xml:id="S3.p18.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p19">
      <p>Observe that a finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S3.p19.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p19.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with property (Bd) can be used to construct a combination with repetitions, denoted
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})" text="[inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2)" xml:id="S3.p19.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p19.m3.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m3.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> (note that, in general, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})\neq\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(V_{%&#10;S}Y_{2})" text="[inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2) not-equals ([inq] _ S)@(V _ S * Y _ 2)" xml:id="S3.p19.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p19.m4.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m4.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m4.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m4.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m4.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m4.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(V_{S}Y_{2})\subseteq\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}%&#10;}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([inq] _ S)@(V _ S * Y _ 2) subset-of-or-equals ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p19.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m5.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m5.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>

                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m5.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m5.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m5.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m5.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>), of the system <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p19.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>

                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, whose elements are individual inequalities of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p19.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>

                <XMWrap>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
so that every inequality <Math mode="inline" tex="q=\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}(u)" text="q = ([inq] _ S)@(u)" xml:id="S3.p19.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p19.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m9.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m9.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m9.1">

              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> occurs in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})" text="[inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2)" xml:id="S3.p19.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>

                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p19.m10.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m10.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as many times as the number
of preimages of <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S3.p19.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{S}Y_{2}" text="V _ S * Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.p19.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMApp>

              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> under <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}_{S}" text="[inq] _ S" xml:id="S3.p19.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. It follows from Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem1"/> that if <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})=[[q_{1},\dots,q_{m}]]" text="[inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2) = delimited-[]@(list@(q _ 1, dots, q _ m))" xml:id="S3.p19.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p19.m14.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m14.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S3.p19.m14.4">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m14.4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p19.m14.2">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m14.4.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, then</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex10">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{q\in\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})}q^{L}:=\sum_{j=1}^{m}q_{j}^{%&#10;L}=-2{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})x_{s}." text="(sum _ (q element-of [inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2)))@(q ^ L) assign ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@((q _ j) ^ L) = - 2 * bar@(r) * Y _ 2 * x _ s" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.1"><text font="sansserif" fontsize="70%">inq</text></XMText>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p20">
      <p>In the opposite direction, we will prove the following.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lem2" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 3.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 3.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 3.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a nonempty combination with repetitions of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:l2i11" xml:id="S3.E8">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3.8)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3.8</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{q\in Q}q^{L}=-Cx_{s}," text="(sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ L) = - C * x _ s" xml:id="S3.E8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.E8.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.E8.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 675 **** -->                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">where <Math mode="inline" tex="C&gt;0" text="C &gt; 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer. Then there exists a finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has property (Bd) and <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{Q})=Q" text="[inq]@(V _ S * Y _ Q) = Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In particular,</text></p>

    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p21">
        <p>We will construct an <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S3.p21.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p21.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> whose set <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{S}Y_{Q}" text="V _ S * Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p21.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of secondary vertices is in bijective correspondence <Math mode="inline" tex="u_{j}\to q_{j}" text="u _ j to q _ j" xml:id="S3.p21.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j=1,\dots,m" text="j = list@(1, dots, m)" xml:id="S3.p21.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m5.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m5.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p21.m5.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p21.m5.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p21.m5.3">m</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with elements of <Math mode="inline" tex="Q=[[q_{1},\dots,q_{m}]]" text="Q = delimited-[]@(list@(q _ 1, dots, q _ m))" xml:id="S3.p21.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S3.p21.m6.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m6.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m6.2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p21.m6.2.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p21.m6.1">…</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p21.m6.2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> so that vertices of type <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p21.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{S}Y_{Q}" text="V _ S * Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p21.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> correspond to inequalities of type <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p21.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S3.p21.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, see (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqa"/>)–(<ref labelref="LABEL:inqb"/>). To fix notation, we
let the inequality <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{j}" text="q _ j" xml:id="S3.p21.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be defined by means of an <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{j}" text="alpha _ j" xml:id="S3.p21.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-admissible function</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex11">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\Omega}_{j}:T_{j}\to S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})," text="Omega _ j colon T _ j to S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S3.Ex11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex11.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex11.m1.1">
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex11.m1.1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex11.m1.1.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>

                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            </XMApp>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>

            </XMath>
          </Math>. This is a local structure of the graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p22.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> around its secondary vertices. Now we will identify in pairs initial vertices
of edges <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{1,j},\dots,e_{k_{j},j}" text="list@(e _ (list@(1, j)), dots, e _ (list@(k _ j, j)))" xml:id="S3.p22.m9">
            <XMath>

                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m9.6">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p22.m9.1">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m9.2">j</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p22.m9.5">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m9.7">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m9.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m9.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m9.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m9.3">j</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j=1,\dots,m" text="j = list@(1, dots, m)" xml:id="S3.p22.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m10.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m10.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p22.m10.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p22.m10.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m10.3">m</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which will form the set of primary vertices <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{P}Y_{Q}" text="V _ P * Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p22.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p22.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In the notation introduced above, it follows from the definitions (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqa"/>)–(<ref labelref="LABEL:inqb"/>) that a typical term <Math mode="inline" tex="\pm x_{A}" text="plus-or-minus x _ A" xml:id="S3.p22.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{j}^{L}" text="(q _ j) ^ L" xml:id="S3.p22.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has the form <Math mode="inline" tex="(-1)^{{\alpha}_{j}}x_{A}" text="(- 1) ^ (alpha _ j) * x _ A" xml:id="S3.p22.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m15.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="A={{\Omega}_{j}(b_{\ell,j})}" text="A = Omega _ j * b _ (list@(ell, j))" xml:id="S3.p22.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m16.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m16.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m16.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m16.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m16.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m16.2">j</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell=1,\dots,k_{j}" text="ell = list@(1, dots, k _ j)" xml:id="S3.p22.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m17.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m17.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m17.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p22.m17.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p22.m17.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m17.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p23">
        <p>It follows from equality (<ref labelref="LABEL:l2i11"/>) that there is an involution map <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S3.p23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on the set of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pm x_{A}" text="plus-or-minus x _ A" xml:id="S3.p23.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> terms of the formal sum <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{m}q_{j}^{L}" text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@((q _ j) ^ L)" xml:id="S3.p23.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that takes every term <Math mode="inline" tex="\pm x_{A}" text="plus-or-minus x _ A" xml:id="S3.p23.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{j}^{L}" text="(q _ j) ^ L" xml:id="S3.p23.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to a term <Math mode="inline" tex="\mp x_{A}" text="minus-or-plus x _ A" xml:id="S3.p23.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus-or-plus" name="mp" role="ADDOP">∓</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{j^{\prime}}^{L}" text="(q _ (j ^ prime)) ^ L" xml:id="S3.p23.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j\neq j^{\prime}" text="j not-equals j ^ prime" xml:id="S3.p23.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota^{2}=\mbox{id}" text="iota ^ 2 = [id]" xml:id="S3.p23.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMText>id</XMText>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Therefore, if</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex12">
          <Math mode="display" tex="(-1)^{{\alpha}_{j}}x_{{\Omega}_{j}(b_{\ell,j})}\quad\mbox{and}\quad(-1)^{{%&#10;\alpha}_{j^{\prime}}}x_{{\Omega}_{j^{\prime}}(b_{\ell^{\prime},j^{\prime}})}" text="list@((- 1) ^ (alpha _ j) * x _ (Omega _ j * b _ (list@(ell, j))), [and], (- 1) ^ (alpha _ (j ^ prime)) * x _ (Omega _ (j ^ prime) * b _ (list@(ell ^ prime, j ^ prime))))" xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.8"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.7"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.9"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.8">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.8.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.3">

                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.1"/>

                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                  <XMText xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.7">and</XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.9">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex12.m1.6"/>
                          <XMWrap>

                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.6">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1.4">
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>

                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>

                          </XMWrap>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>are two terms of the formal sum <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{m}q_{j}^{L}" text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@((q _ j) ^ L)" xml:id="S3.p23.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which are <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S3.p23.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-images of each other, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\{{\alpha}_{j},{\alpha}_{j^{\prime}}\}=\{1,2\}" text="set@(alpha _ j, alpha _ (j ^ prime)) = set@(1, 2)" xml:id="S3.p23.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m12.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m12.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m12.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m12.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                <XMDual>
