        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex13">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tau_{Q}:\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{Q})\to Y_{Q}" text="tau _ Q colon core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ Q) to Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m1.1">core</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex13.m1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>is surjective. Note that the map <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau_{Q}" text="tau _ Q" xml:id="S3.p23.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the analogue of <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau_{2}" text="tau _ 2" xml:id="S3.p23.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, see (<ref labelref="LABEL:tau1"/>).
Hence, <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p23.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has property (B). Clearly, <Math mode="inline" tex="\deg u\leq d" text="degree@(u) less= d" xml:id="S3.p23.m32">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in V_{S}Y_{Q}" text="u element-of V _ S * Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p23.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, whence <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{Q}" text="Y _ Q" xml:id="S3.p23.m34">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> also has property (Bd).
The equalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:l2i2"/>) follow from Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem1"/>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S3.p24">
      <p>We summarize Lemmas <ref labelref="LABEL:lem1"/>–<ref labelref="LABEL:lem2"/> in the following.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lem3" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 3.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 3.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 3.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">The function <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}:Y_{2}\to\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})=Q" text="[inq] colon Y _ 2 to [inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2) = Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>

                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> from the set of finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graphs <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with property (Bd) to the set of combinations <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with repetitions of the system <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with the property
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{q\in Q}q^{L}=-Cx_{s}" text="(sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ L) = - C * x _ s" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="C&gt;0" text="C &gt; 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer, is surjective. In addition, if <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(V_{S}Y_{2})=Q" text="[inq]@(V _ S * Y _ 2) = Q" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8">

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>

                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8.2">

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> then</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:l2i1" xml:id="S3.Ex14">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{q\in Q}q^{L}=-2{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})x_{s}\quad\mbox{and}\quad\sum_{q%&#10;\in Q}q^{R}=-2{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{2}))." text="formulae@((sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ L) = list@(- 2 * bar@(r) * Y _ 2 * x _ s, [and]), (sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ R) = - 2 * bar@(r) * core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ 2))" xml:id="S3.Ex14.m1">

                          </XMApp>

                                      </XMApp>

                                    </XMWrap>
