                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p25">
        <p>This is straightforward from Lemmas <ref labelref="LABEL:lem1"/>–<ref labelref="LABEL:lem2"/> and their proofs.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" xml:id="S4">
    <tags>
      <tag>4</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§4</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">4</tag>Utilizing Linear and Linear Semi-infinite Programming</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">4</tag>Utilizing Linear and Linear Semi-infinite Programming</toctitle>
<!--  %**** String Line 725 **** -->    <para xml:id="S4.p1">
      <p>First we briefly review relevant results from the theory of linear programming (LP) over the field <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S4.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of rational numbers. Following the notation of Schrijver’s monograph <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="S86" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, let <Math mode="inline" tex="A\in\mathbb{Q}^{m\times n}" text="A element-of Q ^ (m * n)" xml:id="S4.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be an <Math mode="inline" tex="m\times n" text="m * n" xml:id="S4.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-matrix, let <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in\mathbb{Q}^{n\times 1}=\mathbb{Q}^{n}" text="b element-of Q ^ (n * 1) = Q ^ n" xml:id="S4.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a column vector, let <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in\mathbb{Q}^{1\times n}" text="c element-of Q ^ (1 * n)" xml:id="S4.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a row vector, <Math mode="inline" tex="c=(c_{1},\ldots,c_{n})" text="c = vector@(c _ 1, ldots, c _ n)" xml:id="S4.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m6.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m6.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p1.m6.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p1.m6.1">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p1.m6.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and let <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S4.p1.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a column vector consisting of variables <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1},\dots,x_{n}" text="list@(x _ 1, dots, x _ n)" xml:id="S4.p1.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m8.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m8.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m8.3"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p1.m8.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p1.m8.1">…</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p1.m8.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, so <Math mode="inline" tex="x=(x_{1},\dots,x_{n})^{\top}" text="x = (vector@(x _ 1, dots, x _ n)) ^ top" xml:id="S4.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m9.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p1.m9.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p1.m9.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p1.m9.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p1.m9.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="M^{\top}" text="M ^ top" xml:id="S4.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> means the transpose of a matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S4.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
The inequality <Math mode="inline" tex="x\geq 0" text="x &gt;= 0" xml:id="S4.p1.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> means that <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{i}\geq 0" text="x _ i &gt;= 0" xml:id="S4.p1.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="i" text="i" xml:id="S4.p1.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p2">
      <p>A typical LP-problem asks about the maximal value of the objective linear functional</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex1">
        <Math mode="display" tex="cx=c_{1}x_{1}+\dots+c_{n}x_{n}" text="c * x = c _ 1 * x _ 1 + dots + c _ n * x _ n" xml:id="S4.Ex1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>over all <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\mathbb{Q}^{n}" text="x element-of Q ^ n" xml:id="S4.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> subject to a finite system of linear inequalities <Math mode="inline" tex="Ax\leq b" text="A * x less= b" xml:id="S4.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
This value (and often the LP-problem itself) is denoted</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex2">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}." text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.Ex2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex2.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex2.m1.2">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex2.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex2.m1.2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex2.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex2.m1.2.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p3">
      <p>We write <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}=-\infty" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b) = - infinity" xml:id="S4.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p3.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> if the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b)" xml:id="S4.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m2.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m2.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m2.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m2.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is empty. We write <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}=+\infty" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b) = + infinity" xml:id="S4.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p3.m3.1">max</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m3.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> if the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b)" xml:id="S4.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m4.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m4.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m4.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m4.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is unbounded from above and say that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m5.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m5.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p3.m5.1">max</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is finite if the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b)" xml:id="S4.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m6.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m6.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m6.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m6.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is nonempty and bounded from above. The notation and terminology for an LP-problem</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex3">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\min\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}=-\max\{-cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="minimum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b) = - maximum@(- conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.1">min</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.2">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>is analogous with
<Math mode="inline" tex="-\infty" text="- infinity" xml:id="S4.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="+\infty" text="+ infinity" xml:id="S4.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> interchanged.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p4">
      <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m1.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m1.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p4.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p4.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an LP-problem as defined above, then the problem</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex4">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\min\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}," text="minimum@(conditional@(b ^ top * y, A ^ top * y) = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex4.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex4.m1.2">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex4.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex4.m1.2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex4.m1.2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m1.1">min</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex4.m1.2.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex4.m1.2.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 750 **** -->              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="y=(y_{1},\dots,y_{m})^{\top}" text="y = (vector@(y _ 1, dots, y _ m)) ^ top" xml:id="S4.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p4.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p4.m2.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p4.m2.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, is called the <text font="italic">dual</text> problem of the <text font="italic">primal</text>
LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p4.m3.1">max</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p4.m3.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p5">
      <p>The (weak) duality theorem of linear programming can be stated as follows, see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="S86" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Sect. 7.4]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_TA" inlist="thm theorem:TA" xml:id="ThmTAx1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem A</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem A</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem A</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m1.2">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be an LP-problem and let
<Math mode="inline" tex="\min\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="minimum@(conditional@(b ^ top * y, A ^ top * y) = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m2.1">min</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m2.2">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m2.3">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be its dual LP-problem.
Then
for every <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\mathbb{Q}^{n}" text="x element-of Q ^ n" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="Ax\leq b" text="A * x less= b" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="y\in\mathbb{Q}^{m}" text="y element-of Q ^ m" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0" text="formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m6.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, one has <Math mode="inline" tex="cx\leq y^{\top}Ax\leq b^{\top}y" text="c * x less= y ^ top * A * x less= b ^ top * y" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:dt" xml:id="S4.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(4.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}=\min\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b) = minimum@(conditional@(b ^ top * y, A ^ top * y) = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)" xml:id="S4.E1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E1.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E1.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.E1.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E1.m1.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E1.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E1.m1.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E1.m1.5"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.E1.m1.2">min</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E1.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E1.m1.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">provided both polyhedra <Math mode="inline" tex="\{x\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="conditional-set@(x, A * x less= b)" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m8.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0))" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.1">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.2.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m9.2.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are not empty. In addition,
the minimum, whenever it is finite, is attained at a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y" text="widehat@(absent) * y" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> which is a vertex of
the polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0))" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.1">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.2.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmTAx1.p1.m11.2.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p6">
      <p>Since the system of inequalities <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p6.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m1.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m1.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p6.m1.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p6.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, as defined in Sect. 3, is infinite in general, we also recall basic terminology and results regarding duality in linear semi-infinite programming (LSIP), see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP2" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP3" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. Consider a generalized LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.p6.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m2.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m2.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p6.m2.1">max</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p6.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> that has countably many linear inequalities in the system <Math mode="inline" tex="Ax\leq b" text="A * x less= b" xml:id="S4.p6.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> while the number of variables in <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S4.p6.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is still finite. Hence, in this setting, <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p6.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a matrix with countably many rows and <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S4.p6.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> columns, or <Math mode="inline" tex="A\in\mathbb{Q}^{\infty\times n}" text="A element-of Q ^ (infinity * n)" xml:id="S4.p6.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an <Math mode="inline" tex="\infty\times n" text="infinity * n" xml:id="S4.p6.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-matrix, <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in\mathbb{Q}^{\infty\times 1}=\mathbb{Q}^{\infty}" text="b element-of Q ^ (infinity * 1) = Q ^ infinity" xml:id="S4.p6.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, or <Math mode="inline" tex="b" text="b" xml:id="S4.p6.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an infinite column vector, <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in\mathbb{Q}^{1\times n}" text="c element-of Q ^ (1 * n)" xml:id="S4.p6.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a row vector, and <Math mode="inline" tex="x=(x_{1},\dots,x_{n})^{\top}" text="x = (vector@(x _ 1, dots, x _ n)) ^ top" xml:id="S4.p6.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m12.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m12.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p6.m12.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p6.m12.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p6.m12.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p6.m12.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p7">
      <p>A typical LSIP-problem over <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S4.p7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> asks about the supremum of the objective linear functional <Math mode="inline" tex="cx" text="c * x" xml:id="S4.p7.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> over all <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\mathbb{Q}^{n}" text="x element-of Q ^ n" xml:id="S4.p7.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> subject to <Math mode="inline" tex="Ax\leq b" text="A * x less= b" xml:id="S4.p7.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This number and the problem itself is denoted <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p7.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. As above, we write <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}=-\infty" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b)) = - infinity" xml:id="S4.p7.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m6.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m6.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
