                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S4.p8.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the number <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p8.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Clearly, for every <Math mode="inline" tex="i" text="i" xml:id="S4.p8.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{i}\geq M_{i+1}\geq M" text="M _ i &gt;= M _ (i + 1) &gt;= M" xml:id="S4.p8.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Note that in general <Math mode="inline" tex="\lim_{i\to\infty}M_{i}\neq M" text="(limit _ (i to infinity))@(M _ i) not-equals M" xml:id="S4.p8.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP1,LSIP2" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p9">
      <p>Similarly to <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP2" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LSIP3" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, we say that
if <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p9.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an LSIP-problem as above, then the problem</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex5">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\inf\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}," text="infimum@(conditional-set@(b ^ top * y, formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)))" xml:id="S4.Ex5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex5.m1.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex5.m1.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex5.m1.1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex5.m1.1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex5.m1.1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex5.m1.1.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex5.m1.1.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex5.m1.1.2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex5.m1.1.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex5.m1.1.2.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="y=(y_{1},y_{2},\dots)^{\top}" text="y = (vector@(y _ 1, y _ 2, dots)) ^ top" xml:id="S4.p9.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m2.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m2.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p9.m2.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an infinite vector whose set of nonzero components is finite, is called the <text font="italic">dual problem</text> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p9.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m3.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m3.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p10">
      <p>For later reference, we state an analogue of Theorem A for linear semi-infinite programming which, in fact, is an easy corollary of Theorem A.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_TB" inlist="thm theorem:TB" xml:id="ThmTBx1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem B</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem B</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem B</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m1.2">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an LSIP-problem
whose set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b)" xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is nonempty and bounded from above and whose dual problem is <Math mode="inline" tex="\inf\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="infimum@(conditional-set@(b ^ top * y, formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)))" xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">inf</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.2.1">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m3.2.2">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:dtt" xml:id="S4.E2">
          <tags>
            <tag>(4.2)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.2</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}\leq\inf\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b)) less= infimum@(conditional-set@(b ^ top * y, formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)))" xml:id="S4.E2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.E2.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.E2.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E2.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E2.m1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.E2.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.E2.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E2.m1.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S4.E2.m1.4">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E2.m1.4.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E2.m1.4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.E2.m1.4.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.E2.m1.4.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">and the equality holds if and only if
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmTBx1.p1.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m4.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m4.2">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="\lim_{i\to\infty}M_{i}" text="(limit _ (i to infinity))@(M _ i)" xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{i}:=\max\{cx\mid A_{i}x\leq b_{i}\}" text="M _ i assign maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A _ i * x) less= b _ i)" xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m6">

                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmTBx1.p1.m6.2">

    <para xml:id="S4.p11">

    <para xml:id="S4.p12">
      <p>We will also need a corollary of the complementary slackness and Carathéodory theorem, see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="S86" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Corollary 7.11]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_TC" inlist="thm theorem:TC" xml:id="ThmTCx1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem C</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem C</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem C</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="ThmTCx1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">If both optima in (<ref labelref="LABEL:dt"/>) are finite, then the minimum is attained at a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{y}" text="widehat@(y)" xml:id="ThmTCx1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{y}\geq 0" text="widehat@(y) &gt;= 0" xml:id="ThmTCx1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, whose positive components correspond to linear independent columns of <Math mode="inline" tex="A^{\top}" text="A ^ top" xml:id="ThmTCx1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, i.e., rows of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="ThmTCx1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p13">
      <p>We now consider the problem of maximizing the objective linear functional <Math mode="inline" tex="cx:=-x_{s}" text="c * x assign - x _ s" xml:id="S4.p13.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> over all rational vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S4.p13.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\mathbb{Q}^{n^{\prime}}" text="x element-of Q ^ n ^ prime" xml:id="S4.p13.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, for a suitable <Math mode="inline" tex="n^{\prime}" text="n ^ prime" xml:id="S4.p13.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, subject to the system of linear inequalities <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p13.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, as an LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="S4.p13.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m6.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m6.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p13.m6.1">max</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Note that, in this context, <Math mode="inline" tex="m^{\prime}=m_{\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}}" text="m ^ prime = m _ [inq]" xml:id="S4.p13.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif" fontsize="70%">inq</text></XMText>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="n^{\prime}=n_{\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}}" text="n ^ prime = n _ [inq]" xml:id="S4.p13.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif" fontsize="70%">inq</text></XMText>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}}" text="m _ [inq]" xml:id="S4.p13.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif" fontsize="70%">inq</text></XMText>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the number of inequalities in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p13.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m10.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m10.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p13.m10.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m10.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="n_{\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}}" text="n _ [inq]" xml:id="S4.p13.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif" fontsize="70%">inq</text></XMText>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the number of all variables <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{j,A},x_{s}" text="list@(x _ (list@(j, A)), x _ s)" xml:id="S4.p13.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>

                <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m12.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m12.1">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m12.2">A</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m12.4">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p13.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m13.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m13.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p13.m13.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m13.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p14">
      <p>We now consider the problem of maximizing the objective linear functional</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex6">
        <Math mode="display" tex="cx:=-x_{s}" text="c * x assign - x _ s" xml:id="S4.Ex6.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>over all rational vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S4.p14.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\mathbb{Q}^{n}" text="x element-of Q ^ n" xml:id="S4.p14.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for a suitable <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S4.p14.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, subject to the system of linear inequalities <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p14.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m4.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m4.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p14.m4.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m4.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> introduced in Sect. 3, as an LSIP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p14.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p15">
      <p>We also consider a subsequence of <Math mode="inline" tex="i_{d}" text="i _ d" xml:id="S4.p15.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-approximate LP-problems <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid A_{i_{d}}x\leq b_{i_{d}}\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A _ i _ d * x) less= b _ i _ d)" xml:id="S4.p15.m2">
          <XMath>

                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>

                      </XMApp>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the
LSIP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p15.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p15.m3.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p15.m3.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
whose systems <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{i_{d}}x\leq b_{i_{d}}" text="A _ i _ d * x less= b _ i _ d" xml:id="S4.p15.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of inequalities are finite subsystems <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p15.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>

              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p15.m5.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p15.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p15.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m6.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m6.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>

                <XMWrap>

                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p15.m6.2">

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="d=3,4,\dots" text="d = list@(3, 4, dots)" xml:id="S4.p15.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m7.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p15.m7.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p15.m7.1">3</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p15.m7.2">4</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p15.m7.3">…</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, as defined in (<ref labelref="LABEL:slid"/>).</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p16">
      <p>It is straightforward to verify that the dual problem
<Math mode="inline" tex="\inf\{b^{\top}y\mid A^{\top}y=c^{\top},y\geq 0\}" text="infimum@(conditional-set@(b ^ top * y, formulae@(A ^ top * y = c ^ top, y &gt;= 0)))" xml:id="S4.p16.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">inf</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p16.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.p16.m1.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m1.2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m1.2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p16.m1.2.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p16.m1.2.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of this LSIP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(c * x, A * x less= b))" xml:id="S4.p16.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p16.m2.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p16.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> can be equivalently stated as follows</p>

      <p>where almost all <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{j}" text="y _ j" xml:id="S4.p16.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j=1,2,\dots" text="j = list@(1, 2, dots)" xml:id="S4.p16.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m4.1"/>

                  <XMRef idref="S4.p16.m4.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p16.m4.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p16.m4.2">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p16.m4.3">…</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, are 0’s. We rewrite

    <para xml:id="S4.p17">
      <p>Analogously, the dual problem of the <Math mode="inline" tex="i_{d}" text="i _ d" xml:id="S4.p17.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-approximate LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{cx\mid A_{i_{d}}x\leq b_{i_{d}}\}" text="maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A _ i _ d * x) less= b _ i _ d)" xml:id="S4.p17.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p17.m2.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p17.m2.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p17.m2.1">max</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p17.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> can be stated in the form</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex7">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\to\min\quad\mbox{subject to}\quad y\geq 0,\ %&#10;\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}" text="formulae@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R) to list@(minimum, [subject to]), formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.3">
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.1">min</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMText xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.2">subject to</XMText>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.4">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.4.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.4.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>

                          <XMApp>

                          </XMApp>

                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>which we will write as</p>

    <para xml:id="S4.p18">
      <p>In Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem3"/>, we established the existence of a surjective function</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex8">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}:Y_{2}\to\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(Y_{2})" text="[inq] colon Y _ 2 to [inq]@(Y _ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1">

        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>from the set of finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S4.p18.m1">

Now we will relate these combinations
with repetitions of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p18.m4">
          <XMath>

            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to solutions of the dual LP-problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlpd"/>).</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p19">
      <p>Consider a combination
with repetitions <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S4.p19.m1">

            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> that has the property
<!--  %**** String Line 850 **** --></p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:st1" xml:id="S4.E6">
        <tags>

            <XMDual>

                        <XMRef idref="S4.E6.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>

                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="C(Q)&gt;0" text="C * Q &gt; 0" xml:id="S4.p19.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
              <XMApp>

                  <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an integer. As before, let all inequalities of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p19.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>

                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m4.1"/>

              <XMApp>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p19.m4.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{1},\dots,q_{i_{d}}" text="list@(q _ 1, dots, q _ i _ d)" xml:id="S4.p19.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m5.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m5.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m5.3"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p19.m5.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p19.m5.1">…</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p19.m5.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, let <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell_{j}(Q)" text="ell _ j * Q" xml:id="S4.p19.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m6.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p19.m6.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denote the number of times that <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{j}" text="q _ j" xml:id="S4.p19.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> occurs in <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S4.p19.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta_{j}" text="delta _ j" xml:id="S4.p19.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be the coefficient of <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{s}" text="x _ s" xml:id="S4.p19.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{j}" text="q _ j" xml:id="S4.p19.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Then it follows from the definitions and (<ref labelref="LABEL:st1"/>) that</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:st2" xml:id="S4.E7">
        <tags>
          <tag>(4.7)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.7</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{q\in Q}q^{L}=\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}\delta_{j}\ell_{j}(Q)x_{s}=-C(Q)x_{s}." text="(sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ L) = ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(delta _ j * ell _ j * Q * x _ s) = - C * Q * x _ s" xml:id="S4.E7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E7.m1.1">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E7.m1.2">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Consider the map</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:dfyy" xml:id="S4.E8">
