      <p>where
<Math mode="inline" tex="y_{Q,j}:=\tfrac{\ell_{j}(Q)}{C(Q)}" text="y _ (list@(Q, j)) assign (ell _ j * Q) / (C * Q)" xml:id="S4.p19.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m12.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m12.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p19.m12.1">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p19.m12.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m12.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p19.m12.3">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m12.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p19.m12.4">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="j=1,\dots,i_{d}" text="j = list@(1, dots, i _ d)" xml:id="S4.p19.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m13.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m13.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m13.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p19.m13.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p19.m13.2">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p19.m13.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
It follows from the definitions that <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{Q}" text="y _ Q" xml:id="S4.p19.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a rational vector, <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{Q}\geq 0" text="y _ Q &gt;= 0" xml:id="S4.p19.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and, by (<ref labelref="LABEL:st2"/>), <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{Q}" text="y _ Q" xml:id="S4.p19.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> satisfies the condition</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex9">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{{Q,j}}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}." text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ (list@(Q, j)) * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex9.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex9.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex9.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.1">Q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.2">j</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Hence, <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{Q}" text="y _ Q" xml:id="S4.p19.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a vector in the polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.p19.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m18.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m18.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p19.m18.1">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S4.p19.m18.2">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m18.2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p19.m18.2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p19.m18.2.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p19.m18.2.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the dual LP-problem
(<ref labelref="LABEL:dlpd"/>).</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p20">
      <p>Conversely, let <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y=({\widehat{}}y_{1},\dots,{\widehat{}}y_{i_{d}})^{\top}" text="widehat@(absent) * y = (vector@(widehat@(absent) * y _ 1, dots, widehat@(absent) * y _ i _ d)) ^ top" xml:id="S4.p20.m1">

          </XMath>
        </Math> be a vector of the feasible polyhedron</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex10">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1">

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Now we can see that the vector <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{Q}=\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}(Q({\widehat{}}y))" text="y _ Q = ([sol] _ d)@(Q * widehat@(absent) * y)" xml:id="S4.p20.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p20.m10.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p20.m10.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p20.m10.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p20.m10.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p20.m10.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p20.m10.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, defined by (<ref labelref="LABEL:dfyy"/>) for <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S4.p20.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y" text="widehat@(absent) * y" xml:id="S4.p20.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}(Q({\widehat{}}y))={\widehat{}}y" text="([sol] _ d)@(Q * widehat@(absent) * y) = widehat@(absent) * y" xml:id="S4.p20.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p20.m13.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p20.m13.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p20.m13.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p20.m13.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p20.m13.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p20.m13.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p21">
      <p>We now summarize our findings.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lem4" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 4.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 4.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 4.1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">The map <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}:Q\to y_{Q}" text="[sol] _ d colon Q to y _ Q" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> defined by (<ref labelref="LABEL:dfyy"/>) is a
surjective function from the set of combinations <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with repetitions of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> that
satisfy an equation <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{q\in Q}q^{L}=-Cx_{s}" text="(sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ L) = - C * x _ s" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="C&gt;0" text="C &gt; 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer, to the set of
vectors of the rational polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of the dual LP-problem
(<ref labelref="LABEL:dlpd"/>). Furthermore, the composition of the maps
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}" text="[inq]" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}" text="[sol] _ d" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,  <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}\circ\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}:Y_{2}\to{%&#10;\widehat{}}y={\widehat{}}y(Y_{2})" text="[sol] _ d compose [inq] colon Y _ 2 to widehat@(absent) * y = widehat@(absent) * y * Y _ 2" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, provides a surjective function from the set of finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graphs with property (Bd) to the set of points of the rational polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.1">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of the dual LP-problem
(<ref labelref="LABEL:dlpd"/>). Under this map, the value of the objective function
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}{\widehat{}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}" text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(widehat@(absent) * y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m12">
              <XMath>

    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p22">
        <p>As was observed above, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}" text="[sol] _ d" xml:id="S4.p22.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is surjective, hence, by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem3"/>, the composition <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}\circ\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}" text="[sol] _ d compose [inq]" xml:id="S4.p22.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is also surjective.
Consider a finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S4.p22.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S4.p22.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with property (Bd) and define <Math mode="inline" tex="Q:=\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}(Y_{2})" text="Q assign [inq]@(Y _ 2)" xml:id="S4.p22.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p22.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p22.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p22.m5.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p22.m5.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y:=\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}(Q)" text="widehat@(absent) * y assign ([sol] _ d)@(Q)" xml:id="S4.p22.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>

                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p22.m6.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p22.m6.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p22.m6.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math>. It follows from Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem3"/> that</p>

        </equation>
        <p>In view of the definition
(<ref labelref="LABEL:st2"/>) and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem3"/>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="C(Q)=2{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})" text="C * Q = 2 * bar@(r) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S4.p22.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p22.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p22.m7.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p22.m7.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p22.m7.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence, it follows from the definition (<ref labelref="LABEL:dfyy"/>) and equalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqq1"/>) that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex12">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}{\widehat{}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}=(\sum_{q\in Q}q^{R})C(Q)^{-1}=-%&#10;\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{2}))}{{\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})}," text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(widehat@(absent) * y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R) = (sum _ (q element-of Q))@(q ^ R) * C * Q ^ (- 1) = - (bar@(r) * core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * Y _ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.5.1">
                            <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

                                <XMApp>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>as required.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S4.p23">
      <p>We will say that a real number <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(Y_{1})\geq 0" text="sigma * Y _ 1 &gt;= 0" xml:id="S4.p23.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p23.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p23.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the <text font="italic">Walter Neumann
coefficient</text>, or briefly WN-coefficient,
for <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}" text="Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p23.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> if</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex13">
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{2}))\leq\sigma(Y_{1}){%&#10;\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})" text="bar@(r) * core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ 2) less= sigma * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1">

      <p>for every finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S4.p23.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>

          <XMath>

          <XMath>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is minimal with this property.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p24">
      <p>We also consider the WN<Math mode="inline" tex="{}_{d}" text="_d" xml:id="S4.p24.m1">

          <XMath>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S4.p24.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

              <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an integer, for <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}" text="Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p24.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> defined so that</p>
      <equation xml:id="S4.Ex14">
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{2}))\leq\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}%&#10;){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})" text="bar@(r) * core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ 2) less= sigma _ d * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex14.m1">

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>for every finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S4.p24.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S4.p24.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with property (Bd) and <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(Y_{1})" text="sigma _ d * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p24.m7">
          <XMath>

              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMDual>

                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is minimal with this property. It is clear from the definitions that <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(Y_{1})\leq\sigma_{d+1}(Y_{1})\leq\sigma(Y_{1})" text="sigma _ d * Y _ 1 less= sigma _ (d + 1) * Y _ 1 less= sigma * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p24.m8">

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lem5" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 4.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 4.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 4.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq\max\{\deg u\mid u\in V_{S}Y_{1}\}=\deg Y_{1}" text="d &gt;= maximum@(conditional@(degree@(u), u) element-of V _ S * Y _ 1) = degree@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer. Then both optima <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]\}" text="maximum@(- conditional@(x _ s, ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)))" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.2.2">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\min\{\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_%&#10;{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="minimum@(conditional@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), y) &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are finite and satisfy the following inequalities and equalities</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:st3" xml:id="S4.E11">
          <tags>
            <tag>(4.11)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.11</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\displaystyle-2\tfrac{q^{*}}{q^{*}-2}{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})\leq\sup\{-x_{s}%&#10;\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]\}\leq\max\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{%&#10;\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]\}=\\&#10;\displaystyle=\min\{\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^%&#10;{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}=-\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})." text="- 2 * (q ^ * / (q ^ * - 2)) * bar@(r) * Y _ 1 less= supremum@(conditional-set@(- x _ s, [SLI]@(Y _ 1))) less= maximum@(- conditional@(x _ s, ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1))) = minimum@(conditional@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), y) &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s) = - sigma _ d * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.E11.m1">

                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.E11.m1.82">
                              <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.E11.m1.16"><text font="sansserif italic">SLI</text></XMText>

        <p><text font="italic">Furthermore, the minimum is attained at a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)\geq 0" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d &gt;= 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, which is a vertex of the polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m6">

                  <XMWrap>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

        <equation labels="LABEL:st3a" xml:id="S4.E12">
          <tags>
            <tag>(4.12)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.12</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\displaystyle\inf\{\sum_{j=1}^{\infty}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^%&#10;{\infty}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}=-\sigma(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})\\&#10;\displaystyle\leq\min\{\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=%&#10;1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}=-\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})." text="infimum@(conditional-set@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ infinity)@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ infinity)@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))) = - sigma * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1 less= minimum@(conditional@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), y) &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s) = - sigma _ d * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.E12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E12.m1.84"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.E12.m1.84">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP" xml:id="S4.E12.m1.70">=</XMTok>

      <para xml:id="S4.p26">
        <p>To see that the sets <Math mode="inline" tex="\{x\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]\}" text="conditional-set@(x, [SLI]@(Y _ 1))" xml:id="S4.p26.m1">

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

<Math mode="inline" tex="\{x\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]\}" text="conditional-set@(x, ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1))" xml:id="S4.p26.m2">

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p26.m2.2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are not empty either, we will show that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}x" text="widehat@(absent) * x" xml:id="S4.p26.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, whose components are
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}x_{A}=0" text="widehat@(absent) * x _ A = 0" xml:id="S4.p26.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="A\subseteq V_{P}Y_{1}" text="A subset-of-or-equals V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p26.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>

                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}x_{s}=2\tfrac{q^{*}}{q^{*}-2}{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})" text="widehat@(absent) * x _ s = 2 * (q ^ * / (q ^ * - 2)) * bar@(r) * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p26.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMRef idref="S4.p26.m6.1"/>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, is a solution both to <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p26.m7">

            </XMath>
          </Math> and to <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p26.m8">

          </Math>. To do this, we will check that every inequality of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p26.m9">

          </Math> is satisfied with these values of variables, that is,</p>

        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.p26.m10">

            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let
<Math mode="inline" tex="T=\{a_{1},\dots,a_{k}\}" text="T = set@(a _ 1, dots, a _ k)" xml:id="S4.p26.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p26.m14.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.p26.m14.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p26.m14.3">

        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx4">

            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\sum_{g\in G_{\alpha}}\max(|T\cap Bg|-2,0)\leq\tfrac{q^{*}}{q^{*}%&#10;-2}(|T|-2)(|B|-2)=\tfrac{q^{*}}{q^{*}-2}(k-2)(\ell-2)." text="(sum _ (g element-of G _ alpha))@(maximum@(absolute-value@(T intersection B * g) - 2, 0)) less= (q ^ * / (q ^ * - 2)) * (absolute-value@(T) - 2) * (absolute-value@(B) - 2) = (q ^ * / (q ^ * - 2)) * (k - 2) * (ell - 2)" xml:id="S4.E14.m2">

        <p>Therefore, summing up inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:dd2"/>) over all vertices <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in V_{S}Y_{1}" text="u element-of V _ S * Y _ 1" xml:id="S4.p26.m31">

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we arrive at</p>

      <para xml:id="S4.p27">
        <p>Thus, according to Theorem A, the maximum and minimum in (<ref labelref="LABEL:st3"/>) are finite and equal. Inequalities in (<ref labelref="LABEL:st3"/>) are shown. Recall that, by Theorem A, the minimum <Math mode="inline" tex="\min\{\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_%&#10;{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="minimum@(conditional@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), y) &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s)" xml:id="S4.p27.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p27.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p27.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p27.m1.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.p27.m1.1">min</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p27.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>

                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

              </XMDual>

          </Math> is attained at a vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S4.p27.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p27.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.p27.m3">

          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.p28">
        <p>By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem4"/>, for every irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S4.p28.m1">

is <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}{\widehat{}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}" text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(widehat@(absent) * y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R)" xml:id="S4.p28.m4">

        <p>covers the feasible polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.p28.m6">

<!--  %**** String Line 1000 **** -->Hence, the supremum</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex19">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1}):=\sup_{Y_{2}}\tfrac{{\bar{\mathrm{r%&#10;}}}(\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{2}))}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})}=-\inf_%&#10;{Y_{2}}\left(-\tfrac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(Y_{1}\times Y_{2})%&#10;)}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{2})}\right)" text="sigma _ d * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1 assign (supremum _ Y _ 2)@((bar@(r) * core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * Y _ 2)) = - (infimum _ Y _ 2)@(- (bar@(r) * core@(Y _ 1 * Y _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * Y _ 2))" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m1">
