                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S4.p28.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p28.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p28.m8.1">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a vertex of the polyhedron <Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.p28.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p28.m9.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p28.m9.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p28.m9.1">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.p28.m9.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p28.m9.2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p28.m9.2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p28.m9.2.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p28.m9.2.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> at which the minimum is attained.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.p29">
        <p>Since</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex23">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\inf\{\sum_{j=1}^{\infty}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{\infty}y_{j}%&#10;q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}=\inf_{d}\min\{\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,%&#10;\ \sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="infimum@(conditional-set@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ infinity)@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ infinity)@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))) = (infimum _ d)@(minimum@(conditional@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), y) &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.3">

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.1"/>

                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.5"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.1">min</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.4">
                          <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp scriptpos="mid">

                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                            <XMApp>

                              <XMApp>

                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(Y_{1})=\sup_{d}(\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}))" text="sigma * Y _ 1 = (supremum _ d)@(sigma _ d * Y _ 1)" xml:id="S4.p29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p29.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p29.m1.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p29.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p29.m1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p29.m1.2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.p29.m1.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the equalities and inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:st3a"/>) follow from proven equalities and inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:st3"/>).
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
<!--  %**** String Line 1025 **** -->  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" xml:id="S5">
    <tags>
      <tag>5</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">5</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§5</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">5</tag>More Lemmas</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">5</tag>More Lemmas</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S5.p1">
      <p>We now let <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}=\prod_{{\alpha}\in I}^{*}G_{\alpha}" text="F = ((product _ (alpha element-of I)) ^ *)@(G _ alpha)" xml:id="S5.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="product" name="prod" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∏</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be an arbitrary free product of nontrivial groups <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S5.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}\in I" text="alpha element-of I" xml:id="S5.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="|I|&gt;1" text="absolute-value@(I) &gt; 1" xml:id="S5.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m4.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m4.1">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S5.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a finitely generated factor-free subgroup of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. As in Sect. 2, let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi_{o}(H)" text="Psi _ o * H" xml:id="S5.p1.m7">

        </Math> denote an irreducible

          </XMath>

    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p2">
      <p>We fix a finitely generated factor-free subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S5.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with positive reduced rank
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1})=-\chi(\Psi(H_{1}))" text="bar@(r) * H _ 1 = - chi * Psi * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m3.2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m3.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="&gt;0" text="absent &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We say that a finitely generated factor-free subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}" text="H _ 2" xml:id="S5.p2.m5">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in case of property (Bd), and the map
<Math mode="inline" tex="\tau_{2}:\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Psi(H_{2}))\to\Psi(H_{2})" text="tau _ 2 colon core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Psi * H _ 2) to Psi * H _ 2" xml:id="S5.p2.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m16.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m16.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p2.m16.1">core</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m16.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m16.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m16.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m16.2.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m16.2.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m16.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m16.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is surjective.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lemBd" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 5.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 5.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}" text="H _ 2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a finitely generated factor-free subgroup of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\deg\Psi(H_{2})\leq d" text="degree@(Psi) * H _ 2 less= d" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer or <Math mode="inline" tex="d=\infty" text="d = infinity" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{2})=-\chi(\Psi(H_{2}))&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * H _ 2 = - chi * Psi * H _ 2 &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and the map <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau_{2}:\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Psi(H_{2}))\to\Psi(H_{2})" text="tau _ 2 colon core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Psi * H _ 2) to Psi * H _ 2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.1">core</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.2.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.2.1">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.2.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.2.2">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is not surjective. Then there exists a finitely generated factor-free subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{4}" text="H _ 4" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with property (Bd) if <Math mode="inline" tex="d&lt;\infty" text="d less infinity" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> or
with property (B) if <Math mode="inline" tex="d=\infty" text="d = infinity" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:bol" xml:id="S5.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(5.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1},H_{4})}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{4})}&gt;\frac{{\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1},H_{2})}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{2})}." text="(bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 4)) / (bar@(r) * H _ 4) &gt; (bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * H _ 2)" xml:id="S5.E1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.E1.m1.7"/>

                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.E1.m1.7">

    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.p3">
        <p>Recall that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1},H_{2})={\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_%&#10;{1})\times\Psi(H_{2})))" text="bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2) = bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Psi * H _ 2)" xml:id="S5.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m1.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m1.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S5.p3.m1.4">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.4.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p3.m1.1">core</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m9.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex2">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma))={\bar{\mathrm%&#10;{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Psi(H_{2})))&gt;0," text="bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma) = bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Psi * H _ 2) &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>

                                      </XMWrap>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>

                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2">
                            <XMApp>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.2">core</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2.1.1"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2.1.1">
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2.1.2"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.3.2.1.2">
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>

                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>whence <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma)&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * Gamma &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p3.m10.1">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It is also clear that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{core}(\Gamma)=\Gamma" text="core@(Gamma) = Gamma" xml:id="S5.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m11.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m11.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p3.m11.1">core</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p3.m11.2">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Therefore,</p>

      <para xml:id="S5.p4">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{1},\dots,\Gamma_{k}" text="list@(Gamma _ 1, dots, Gamma _ k)" xml:id="S5.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m1.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p4.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S5.p4.m1.1">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p4.m1.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be connected components of the graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma" text="Gamma" xml:id="S5.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex3">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma))&gt;0," text="bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma) &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.2.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.2.1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.1">core</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.2.1.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.2.1.1.1"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.2.1.1.1">
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma)&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * Gamma &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p4.m3.1">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Note that the graph
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma)" text="core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma)" xml:id="S5.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>

          </Math>
consists of disjoint graphs <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma_{j})" text="core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma _ j)" xml:id="S5.p4.m5">

      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p5">
        <p>Note that if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j})=0" text="bar@(r) * Gamma _ j = 0" xml:id="S5.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m1.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma_{j}))=0" text="bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma _ j) = 0" xml:id="S5.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S5.p5.m2.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m2.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p5.m2.1">core</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m2.2.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m2.2.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m2.2.1.1">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{j^{*}}" text="Gamma _ (j ^ *)" xml:id="S5.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be chosen so that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j^{*}})&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * Gamma _ (j ^ *) &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the ratio</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex5">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma_{j^{*}}))%&#10;}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j^{*}})}" text="(bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma _ (j ^ *))) / (bar@(r) * Gamma _ (j ^ *))" xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.1">core</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.2.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.2.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.2.1.1">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>is maximal over those graphs <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{j}" text="Gamma _ j" xml:id="S5.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j})&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * Gamma _ j &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m6.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It follows from
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma)=\sum_{j=1}^{k}{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j})&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * Gamma = ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ k)@(bar@(r) * Gamma _ j) &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.p5.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m7.1">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m7.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m7.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that such <Math mode="inline" tex="j^{*}" text="j ^ *" xml:id="S5.p5.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does exist. It is not difficult to see that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex6">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{\sum_{j=1}^{k}{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times%&#10;\Gamma_{j}))}{\sum_{j=1}^{k}{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j})}\leq\frac{{\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma_{j^{*}}))}{{\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j^{*}})}." text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ k)@(bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma _ j)) / ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ k)@(bar@(r) * Gamma _ j) less= (bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma _ (j ^ *))) / (bar@(r) * Gamma _ (j ^ *))" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.7"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.7">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.2">
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.2.1"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.1">core</XMTok>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.2.1">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.2.1.1"/>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.2.1.1">
                                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>

                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMApp>
