                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.5"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.5">
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.5.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.4">core</XMTok>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.5.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                      <XMDual>

                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.6"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.6">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>This, together with (<ref labelref="LABEL:e52"/>) and (<ref labelref="LABEL:e53"/>), implies that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma_{j^{*}}))%&#10;}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma_{j^{*}})}\geq\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(%&#10;\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Gamma))}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Gamma)}&gt;%&#10;\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Psi(H_{2})))}{{%&#10;\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Psi(H_{2}))}." text="(bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma _ (j ^ *))) / (bar@(r) * Gamma _ (j ^ *)) &gt;= (bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Gamma)) / (bar@(r) * Gamma) &gt; (bar@(r) * core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Psi * H _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * Psi * H _ 2)" xml:id="S5.Ex7.m1">

          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p6">
        <p>Hence, picking an arbitrary
primary vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in V_{P}\Gamma_{j^{*}}" text="v element-of V _ P * Gamma _ (j ^ *)" xml:id="S5.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{j^{*}}" text="Gamma _ (j ^ *)" xml:id="S5.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as a base point, and letting <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{4}:=H(\Gamma_{j^{*},v})" text="H _ 4 assign H * Gamma _ (list@(j ^ *, v))" xml:id="S5.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m3.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m3.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m3.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m3.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m3.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p6.m3.1">v</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, as in Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:Lm2"/>, we obtain a subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{4}" text="H _ 4" xml:id="S5.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with the desired inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:bol"/>).
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>

over all finitely generated factor-free subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{3}" text="H _ 3" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{3})&gt;0" text="bar@(r) * H _ 3 &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\deg\Psi(H_{3})\leq d" text="degree@(Psi) * H _ 3 less= d" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer or <Math mode="inline" tex="d=\infty" text="d = infinity" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1},H_{2})}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{2})}" text="supremum@((bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * H _ 2))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
over all finitely generated factor-free subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}" text="H _ 2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>

            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> that have property (Bd) (or property (B) if <Math mode="inline" tex="d=\infty" text="d = infinity" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) relative to <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and satisfy the condition <Math mode="inline" tex="I(H_{2})\subseteq I(H_{1})" text="I * H _ 2 subset-of-or-equals I * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m13.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m13.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m13.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m13.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In particular,</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex8">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sigma_{d}(H_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1})=\sigma_{d}(\Psi(H_{1})){\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}}(\Psi(H_{1}))\quad\mbox{and}\quad\sigma(H_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H%&#10;_{1})=\sigma(\Psi(H_{1})){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\Psi(H_{1}))." text="formulae@(sigma _ d * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 1 = list@(sigma _ d * Psi * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * Psi * H _ 1, [and]), sigma * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 1 = sigma * Psi * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * Psi * H _ 1)" xml:id="S5.Ex8.m1">

      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.p7">
        <p>This first claim follows from Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemBd"/> and the observation that
if the map <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau_{2}:\operatorname{core}(\Psi(H_{1})\times\Psi(H_{2}))\to\Psi(H_{2})" text="tau _ 2 colon core@(Psi * H _ 1 * Psi * H _ 2) to Psi * H _ 2" xml:id="S5.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p7.m1.1">core</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.2.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m1.2.1">
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.2.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m1.2.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m1.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is surjective then <Math mode="inline" tex="I(H_{2})\subseteq I(H_{1})" text="I * H _ 2 subset-of-or-equals I * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m2.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m2.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The equalities follow from the first claim, definitions of numbers <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(H_{1})" text="sigma _ d * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(H_{1})" text="sigma * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,

            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                      <XMDual>

            </XMath>

            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMDual>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemBd"/>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S5.p8">
      <p>In view of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemsup"/>, when investigating</p>
      <equation xml:id="S5.Ex9">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\sup\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1},H_{3})}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{3})}" text="supremum@((bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 3)) / (bar@(r) * H _ 3))" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1">

        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>over all finitely generated factor-free subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{3}" text="H _ 3" xml:id="S5.p8.m1">

              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, we may assume that the index set <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S5.p8.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is finite, i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="I=I(H_{1})" text="I = I * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.p8.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, say, <Math mode="inline" tex="I=\{1,\dots,m\}" text="I = set@(1, dots, m)" xml:id="S5.p8.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m7.1"/>

                </XMApp>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and so <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}=G_{1}*G_{2}*\ldots*G_{m}" text="F = G _ 1 * G _ 2 * ldots * G _ m" xml:id="S5.p8.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

                <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p9">
      <p>Furthermore, in order to be able to make use of results of Sects. 3–4,
<!--  %**** String Line 1125 **** -->we consider <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.p9.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as the following free product</p>
      <equation xml:id="S5.Ex10">
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\mathcal{F}}_{2}(1)=G_{1}*G(2,m)" text="F _ 2 * 1 = G _ 1 * G * open-interval@(2, m)" xml:id="S5.Ex10.m1">

            <XMApp>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>of two groups <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{1}" text="G _ 1" xml:id="S5.p9.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="G(2,m):=G_{2}*\ldots*G_{m}" text="G * open-interval@(2, m) assign G _ 2 * ldots * G _ m" xml:id="S5.p9.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m3.1"/>

                  <XMWrap>

                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.p9.m3.1">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p9.m3.2">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="g_{\alpha}\in G_{\alpha}" text="g _ alpha element-of G _ alpha" xml:id="S5.p9.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be some nontrivial element of <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S5.p9.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}\in I=\{1,\dots,m\}" text="alpha element-of I = set@(1, dots, m)" xml:id="S5.p9.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m6.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m6.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.p9.m6.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S5.p9.m6.2">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p9.m6.3">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. For every <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{\alpha}\in G_{\alpha}" text="a _ alpha element-of G _ alpha" xml:id="S5.p9.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, consider the map</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:map2" xml:id="S5.E4">

      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="g_{{\alpha}+1}\ldots g_{m}g_{1}\ldots g_{\alpha}" text="g _ (alpha + 1) * ldots * g _ m * g _ 1 * ldots * g _ alpha" xml:id="S5.p9.m8">

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a cyclic permutation of the
word <Math mode="inline" tex="g_{1}g_{2}\ldots g_{m}" text="g _ 1 * g _ 2 * ldots * g _ m" xml:id="S5.p9.m9">
          <XMath>

              </XMApp>
              <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID">…</XMTok>

                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p10">
      <p>Recall that a subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="K" text="K" xml:id="S5.p10.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of a group <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.p10.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is called <text font="italic">antinormal</text>
if, for every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in G" text="g element-of G" xml:id="S5.p10.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="gKg^{-1}\cap K\neq\{1\}" text="g * K * g ^ (- 1) intersection K not-equals set@(1)" xml:id="S5.p10.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m4.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.p10.m4.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in K" text="g element-of K" xml:id="S5.p10.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lemmap2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 5.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 5.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="|I|=m\geq 3" text="absolute-value@(I) = m &gt;= 3" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and let <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a finitely generated factor-free subgroup of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then the map (<ref labelref="LABEL:map2"/>) extends to monomorphisms</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex11">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\mu:{\mathcal{F}}\to{\mathcal{F}},\qquad\mu_{2}:{\mathcal{F}}\to{\mathcal{F}}_%&#10;{2}(1)" text="mu colon (F to list@(F, mu _ 2)) colon (F to F _ 2 * 1)" xml:id="S5.Ex11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex11.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex11.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex11.m1.1">F</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex11.m1.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex11.m1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.Ex11.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">that have the following properties.</text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2">
        <p><Math mode="inline" tex="(a)" text="a" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math><text font="italic"> A word <Math mode="inline" tex="U\in{\mathcal{F}}" text="U element-of F" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="|U|&gt;1" text="absolute-value@(U) &gt; 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m3.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m3.1">U</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is cyclically reduced if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(U)" text="mu * U" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p2.m4.1">U</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is cyclically reduced.</text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p3">
        <p><Math mode="inline" tex="(b)" text="b" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p3.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p3.m1.1">b</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math><text font="italic"> The subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu_{2}({\mathcal{F}})" text="mu _ 2 * F" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p3.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>

              <XMath>

            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\deg\Psi(H_{2})\leq d" text="degree@(Psi) * H _ 2 less= d" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m6.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an integer, does not exceed <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\frac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(\mu_{2}(H_{1}),K_{2})}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(K_{2})}" text="supremum@((bar@(r) * open-interval@(mu _ 2 * H _ 1, K _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * K _ 2))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.1.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m8.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> over all finitely generated factor-free subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{2}" text="K _ 2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}_{2}(1)" text="F _ 2 * 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m10.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with property (Bd) relative to <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu_{2}(H_{1})" text="mu _ 2 * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m11.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
In particular, <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(H_{1})\leq\sigma_{d}(\mu_{2}(H_{1}))" text="sigma _ d * H _ 1 less= sigma _ d * mu _ 2 * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12.2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m12.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(H_{1})\leq\sigma(\mu_{2}(H_{1}))" text="sigma * H _ 1 less= sigma * mu _ 2 * H _ 1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13.2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p6.m13.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.p11">
        <p>It is clear that the map (<ref labelref="LABEL:map2"/>) extends to homomorphisms</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex12">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\mu:{\mathcal{F}}\to{\mathcal{F}},\quad\mu_{2}:{\mathcal{F}}\to{\mathcal{F}}_{%&#10;2}(1)." text="mu colon (F to list@(F, mu _ 2)) colon (F to F _ 2 * 1)" xml:id="S5.Ex12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex12.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex12.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex12.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex12.m1.3.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex12.m1.1">F</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex12.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex12.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.Ex12.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Note that if <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{1}\in G_{{\alpha}_{1}}" text="a _ 1 element-of G _ alpha _ 1" xml:id="S5.p11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{2}\in G_{{\alpha}_{2}}" text="a _ 2 element-of G _ alpha _ 2" xml:id="S5.p11.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are nontrivial elements and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}\neq{\alpha}_{2}" text="alpha _ 1 not-equals alpha _ 2" xml:id="S5.p11.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(a_{1})\mu(a_{2})" text="mu * a _ 1 * mu * a _ 2" xml:id="S5.p11.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p11.m4.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m4.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p11.m4.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a cyclically reduced word. This remark implies that the kernels of the maps <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu,\mu_{2}" text="list@(mu, mu _ 2)" xml:id="S5.p11.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p11.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p11.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are trivial, whence <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu,\mu_{2}" text="list@(mu, mu _ 2)" xml:id="S5.p11.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m6.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p11.m6.1">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p11.m6.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are monomorphisms.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p12">
        <p>(a) It follows from the foregoing remark that a word <Math mode="inline" tex="U\in{\mathcal{F}}" text="U element-of F" xml:id="S5.p12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="|U|&gt;1" text="absolute-value@(U) &gt; 1" xml:id="S5.p12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p12.m2.1">U</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cyclically reduced if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(U)" text="mu * U" xml:id="S5.p12.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p12.m3.1">U</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cyclically reduced.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p13">
        <p>(b) Let <Math mode="inline" tex="U_{1},U_{2}\in{\mathcal{F}}" text="list@(U _ 1, U _ 2) element-of F" xml:id="S5.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p13.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p13.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p13.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p13.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
