      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof of Theorem 1.1.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.p2">
        <p>Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="I=\{1,2\}" text="I = set@(1, 2)" xml:id="S6.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p2.m1.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p2.m1.2">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}_{2}=G_{1}*G_{2}" text="F _ 2 = G _ 1 * G _ 2" xml:id="S6.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a finitely generated factor-free noncyclic subgroup of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}_{2}" text="F _ 2" xml:id="S6.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. As before, let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi_{o}(H_{1})" text="Psi _ o * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> denote a finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S6.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

            </XMath>

            <XMath>

                  </XMWrap>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p3">
        <p>Denote <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}:=\Psi(H_{1})" text="Y _ 1 assign Psi * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m1.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and pick an integer <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S6.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
As in Sects. 3–4, consider a system of linear inequalities <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m3.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m3.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and an LP-problem</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:lppf" xml:id="S6.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(6.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">6.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\max\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]\}." text="maximum@(- conditional@(x _ s, ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)))" xml:id="S6.E1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.E1.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.E1.m1.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.E1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.E1.m1.2.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S6.E1.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.E1.m1.2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.E1.m1.2.1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.E1.m1.2.1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S6.E1.m1.2.1.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.E1.m1.2.1.2">
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>According to Theorem A and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem5"/>, the maximum of the LP-problem
(<ref labelref="LABEL:lppf"/>) is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="-\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})" text="- sigma _ d * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

      <para xml:id="S6.p4">
        <p>According to Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem5"/>, the minimum of the dual problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlpd"/>) of (<ref labelref="LABEL:lppf"/>)
is attained at a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S6.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p4.m1.1">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which is a vertex of the feasible polyhedron</p>

                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.E3.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                            <XMText xml:id="S6.E3.m1.4">and</XMText>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.E3.m1.5.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.E3.m1.5.2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMDual xml:id="S6.E3.m1.5.2.1">
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMRef idref="S6.E3.m1.3"/>

                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p5">
        <p>Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not connected and that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{3},{\widehat{}}Y_{4}" text="list@(widehat@(absent) * Y _ 3, widehat@(absent) * Y _ 4)" xml:id="S6.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m2.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are (nonempty) subgraphs of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> so that there is no path in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> from any vertex of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{3}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 3" xml:id="S6.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to a vertex of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{4}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 4" xml:id="S6.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Clearly, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{3},{\widehat{}}Y_{4}" text="list@(widehat@(absent) * Y _ 3, widehat@(absent) * Y _ 4)" xml:id="S6.p5.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m7.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m7.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are finite irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S6.p5.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graphs with property (Bd).
Invoking Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem4"/>, denote <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y^{j}:=\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}(\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}%&#10;({\widehat{}}Y_{j}))" text="widehat@(absent) * y ^ j assign ([sol] _ d)@([inq]@(widehat@(absent) * Y _ j))" xml:id="S6.p5.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m9.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m9.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m9.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.p5.m9.3">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m9.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m9.3.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p5.m9.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m9.3.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j=3,4" text="j = list@(3, 4)" xml:id="S6.p5.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p5.m10.1">3</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p5.m10.2">4</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem4"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y^{3},{\widehat{}}y^{4}" text="list@(widehat@(absent) * y ^ 3, widehat@(absent) * y ^ 4)" xml:id="S6.p5.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m11.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m11.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m11.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m11.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are points in the feasible polyhedron (<ref labelref="LABEL:fplh"/>) of (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlpd"/>).
It is easy to see from the definitions and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem4"/> that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)=\lambda_{3}{\widehat{}}y^{3}+\lambda_{4}{\widehat{}}y^{4}" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d = lambda _ 3 * widehat@(absent) * y ^ 3 + lambda _ 4 * widehat@(absent) * y ^ 4" xml:id="S6.p5.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m12.1">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with some positive rational numbers <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda_{3},\lambda_{4}" text="list@(lambda _ 3, lambda _ 4)" xml:id="S6.p5.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m13.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m13.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m13.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m13.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that satisfy <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda_{3}+\lambda_{4}=1" text="lambda _ 3 + lambda _ 4 = 1" xml:id="S6.p5.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
This, however, is impossible when <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S6.p5.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m15.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m15.1">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a vertex. This contradiction proves that
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p5.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a connected graph. Hence, there is a finitely generated factor-free subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}^{*}" text="(H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="S6.p5.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S6.p5.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> whose
irreducible graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi_{o^{*}}(H_{2}^{*})" text="Psi _ (o ^ *) * (H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="S6.p5.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">o</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m19.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m19.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p5.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, as required.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p6">
        <p>Now we establish the upper bound</p>

        <p>on size of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is defined by equalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:hy2"/>).
Recall that it follows from Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem5"/> that</p>

                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\min\{\sum_{j=1}^{i_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{R}\mid y\geq 0,\sum_{j=1}^{i%&#10;_{d}}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="absent = minimum@(conditional@(((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ R), y) &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ (i _ d))@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s)" xml:id="S6.E5.m2">

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.E5.m2.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.E5.m2.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.E5.m2.3"/>
                          </XMApp>

                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.E5.m2.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>

                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>

                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>

                                </XMApp>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.E5.m2.3">
                                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p7">
        <p>It is convenient to switch back to the general LP notation as was introduced in Sect. 4
and reminded in (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp2"/>)–(<ref labelref="LABEL:lp2"/>). In particular, let <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S6.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be an <Math mode="inline" tex="m\times n" text="m * n" xml:id="S6.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> matrix, i.e.,
<Math mode="inline" tex="m=i_{d}" text="m = i _ d" xml:id="S6.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S6.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the number of variables.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p8">
        <p>According to Theorem C, we may assume that
the minimum of the dual LP-problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp2"/>)
is attained at a vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S6.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m1.1">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)\geq 0" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d &gt;= 0" xml:id="S6.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m2.1">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, of the feasible polyhedron
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{y\mid y\geq 0,\ \sum_{j=1}^{m}y_{j}q_{j}^{L}=-x_{s}\}" text="conditional-set@(y, formulae@(y &gt;= 0, ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@(y _ j * (q _ j) ^ L) = - x _ s))" xml:id="S6.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m3.1">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.p8.m3.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m3.2.1"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p8.m3.2.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p8.m3.2.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                              <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the LP-problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp2"/>)
whose positive components <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y_{i}(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y _ i * d" xml:id="S6.p8.m4">

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> correspond to linearly independent left-hand sides <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{i}^{L}" text="(q _ i) ^ L" xml:id="S6.p8.m5">

Reordering the inequalities of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p8.m9">

            </XMath>
          </Math> if necessary, we may assume that
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y_{1}(d),\dots,{\widehat{}}y_{r}(d)" text="list@(widehat@(absent) * y _ 1 * d, dots, widehat@(absent) * y _ r * d)" xml:id="S6.p8.m10">

            </XMath>
          </Math> are positive, <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{1}^{L},\dots,q_{r}^{L}" text="list@((q _ 1) ^ L, dots, (q _ r) ^ L)" xml:id="S6.p8.m11">
            <XMath>

          </Math> are linearly independent and that
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y_{r+1}(d)=\ldots={\widehat{}}y_{m}(d)=0" text="widehat@(absent) * y _ (r + 1) * d = ldots = widehat@(absent) * y _ m * d = 0" xml:id="S6.p8.m12">
            <XMath>

                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m12.1">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>

                  <XMApp>

                  </XMDual>

                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p9">
        <p>Recall that <Math mode="inline" tex="Ax\leq b" text="A * x less= b" xml:id="S6.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the matrix form of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p9.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m2.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S6.p9.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has size <Math mode="inline" tex="m\times n" text="m * n" xml:id="S6.p9.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{r,n}" text="A _ (list@(r, n))" xml:id="S6.p9.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m5.1">r</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m5.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> denote the submatrix of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S6.p9.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that consists of the first <Math mode="inline" tex="r" text="r" xml:id="S6.p9.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> rows of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S6.p9.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, hence, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y_{1}(d),\dots,{\widehat{}}y_{r}(d)" text="list@(widehat@(absent) * y _ 1 * d, dots, widehat@(absent) * y _ r * d)" xml:id="S6.p9.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m9.4"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m9.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m9.5"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m9.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m9.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m9.1">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p9.m9.3">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m9.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m9.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m9.2">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> correspond to linearly independent rows of <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{r,n}" text="A _ (list@(r, n))" xml:id="S6.p9.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m10.1">r</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m10.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{r\times r}" text="A _ (r * r)" xml:id="S6.p9.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> denote a submatrix of <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{r,n}" text="A _ (list@(r, n))" xml:id="S6.p9.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

of size <Math mode="inline" tex="r\times r" text="r * r" xml:id="S6.p9.m13">

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\bar{y}(d)=({\widehat{}}y_{1}(d),\dots,{\widehat{}}y_{r}(d))^{\top}" text="bar@(y) * d = (vector@(widehat@(absent) * y _ 1 * d, dots, widehat@(absent) * y _ r * d)) ^ top" xml:id="S6.p9.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m15.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m15.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m15.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="top" role="ADDOP">⊤</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a truncated version of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S6.p9.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex6">
          <Math mode="display" tex="A_{r\times r}^{\top}\bar{y}(d)=(c_{1},\dots,c_{r})^{\top}=\bar{c}^{\top}." text="(A _ (r * r)) ^ top * bar@(y) * d = (vector@(c _ 1, dots, c _ r)) ^ top = (bar@(c)) ^ top" xml:id="S6.Ex6.m1">

        <p>Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{i=1}^{m}{\widehat{}}y_{i}(d)q_{i}^{L}=-x_{s}" text="((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ m)@(widehat@(absent) * y _ i * d * (q _ i) ^ L) = - x _ s" xml:id="S6.p9.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m17.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m17.1">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{j}=0" text="c _ j = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{j}" text="c _ j" xml:id="S6.p9.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> corresponds to the column of a variable <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{B}" text="x _ B" xml:id="S6.p9.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{r,n}" text="A _ (list@(r, n))" xml:id="S6.p9.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m21.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{j}=-1" text="c _ j = - 1" xml:id="S6.p9.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{j}" text="c _ j" xml:id="S6.p9.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> corresponds to the column of <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{s}" text="x _ s" xml:id="S6.p9.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
