                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
As before, the relation <Math mode="inline" tex="\approx_{Z}" text="approximately-equals _ Z" xml:id="S6.p24.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is reflexive and symmetric. By taking the transitive closure of the relation <Math mode="inline" tex="\approx_{Z}" text="approximately-equals _ Z" xml:id="S6.p24.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we obtain an equivalence relation on the set <Math mode="inline" tex="C\cup Z" text="C union Z" xml:id="S6.p24.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which is denoted by <Math mode="inline" tex="\approx_{{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}}" text="approximately-equals _ Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p24.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p25">
        <p>We will say that a function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{{C\cup Z}}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, as in (<ref labelref="LABEL:fscz"/>), is <text font="italic">unacceptable</text> if there is an equivalence class <Math mode="inline" tex="[(a,u)]_{\sim_{{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}}}" text="(delimited-[]@(open-interval@(a, u))) _ similar-to _ Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p25.m2.3">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m2.1">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m2.2">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp meaning="similar-to" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\sim_{{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}}" text="similar-to _ Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp meaning="similar-to" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with a single element in it or there is an equivalence class <Math mode="inline" tex="[a]_{\approx_{{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}}}" text="(delimited-[]@(a)) _ approximately-equals _ Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m4.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m4.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the relation <Math mode="inline" tex="\approx_{{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}}" text="approximately-equals _ Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that
contains no elements of <Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S6.p25.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Note that, when given a function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{{C\cup Z}}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as in (<ref labelref="LABEL:fscz"/>), we can algorithmically check whether or not <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{{C\cup Z}}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p25.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is unacceptable.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p26">
        <p>If now the function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p26.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not found to be unacceptable, then we attempt to construct a function <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta:Z\to G_{\alpha}" text="zeta colon Z to G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p26.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by using the following algorithm.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p27">
        <p>First, we set <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{0}(c)=c" text="zeta _ 0 * c = c" xml:id="S6.p27.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m1.1">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C" text="c element-of C" xml:id="S6.p27.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and let <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}:=C" text="C _ 0 assign C" xml:id="S6.p27.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="Z_{0}:=\varnothing" text="Z _ 0 assign empty-set" xml:id="S6.p27.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="varnothing" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Consider the set of all triples <Math mode="inline" tex="(a,u,\ell)" text="vector@(a, u, ell)" xml:id="S6.p27.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m5.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m5.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m5.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m5.2">u</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m5.3">ℓ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in C\cup Z" text="a element-of C union Z" xml:id="S6.p27.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}(a)" text="u element-of Omega _ (C union Z) * a" xml:id="S6.p27.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m7.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq\ell\leq d+1" text="1 less= ell less= d + 1" xml:id="S6.p27.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and do the following. By induction on <Math mode="inline" tex="i\geq 0" text="i &gt;= 0" xml:id="S6.p27.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, assume that the sets
<Math mode="inline" tex="C_{i}\subseteq G_{\alpha}" text="C _ i subset-of-or-equals G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p27.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="Z_{i}\subseteq Z" text="Z _ i subset-of-or-equals Z" xml:id="S6.p27.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are constructed and a bijective function <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{i}:C_{0}\cup Z_{i}\to C_{i}" text="zeta _ i colon C _ 0 union Z _ i to C _ i" xml:id="S6.p27.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is defined so that the restriction of <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{i}" text="zeta _ i" xml:id="S6.p27.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="S6.p27.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{0}" text="zeta _ 0" xml:id="S6.p27.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For every unordered pair
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{(a,u,\ell),(b,v,\ell)\}" text="set@(vector@(a, u, ell), vector@(b, v, ell))" xml:id="S6.p27.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.7"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.8"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.p27.m16.7">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m16.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m16.2">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m16.3">ℓ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.p27.m16.8">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m16.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m16.4">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m16.5">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m16.6">ℓ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of distinct triples with a fixed <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell" text="ell" xml:id="S6.p27.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (first we use <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell=1" text="ell = 1" xml:id="S6.p27.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell=2" text="ell = 2" xml:id="S6.p27.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so on up to <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell=d+1" text="ell = d + 1" xml:id="S6.p27.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>), we check whether there are edges <Math mode="inline" tex="e,f\in EY_{1}" text="list@(e, f) element-of E * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p27.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m21.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m21.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m21.1">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m21.2">f</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{-}=u" text="e _ - = u" xml:id="S6.p27.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

              </XMApp>

            </XMath>
          </Math>. If there are no such edges, then we pass on to the next pair

          </Math>, then we consider three Cases 1–3 below, perform the described actions and pass on to the next pair. We remark that these actions can be
algorithmically implemented as follows from the solvability of the word problem for <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{1},G_{2}" text="list@(G _ 1, G _ 2)" xml:id="S6.p27.m29">

      <para xml:id="S6.p28">
        <p><text font="italic">Case 1.</text>  If both <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b\in C\cup Z_{i}" text="list@(a, b) element-of C union Z _ i" xml:id="S6.p28.m1">

        <p>holds in <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p28.m2">

      <para xml:id="S6.p29">
        <p><text font="italic">Case 2.</text>  Suppose that exactly one of <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b" text="list@(a, b)" xml:id="S6.p29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m1.2">b</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is in <Math mode="inline" tex="C\cup Z_{i}" text="C union Z _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, say <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in C\cup Z_{i}" text="b element-of C union Z _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then it is clear that
<Math mode="inline" tex="a\in Z\setminus Z_{i}" text="a element-of Z set-minus Z _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and we can uniquely determine an element <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta(a)" text="eta * a" xml:id="S6.p29.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m5.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by solving the equation
<Math mode="inline" tex="\eta(a)\zeta_{i}(b)^{-1}={\varphi}(e){\varphi}(f)^{-1}" text="eta * a * zeta _ i * b ^ (- 1) = varphi * e * varphi * f ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S6.p29.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m6.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m6.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m6.2">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m6.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m6.3">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m6.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m6.4">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta(a)\in C_{i}" text="eta * a element-of C _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m7.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then we conclude that the function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p29.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is unacceptable and stop. Otherwise, we set</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex13">
          <Math mode="display" tex="Z_{i+1}:=Z_{i}\cup\{a\},\quad C_{i+1}:=C_{i}\cup\{\eta(a)\}" text="formulae@(Z _ (i + 1) assign Z _ i union set@(a), C _ (i + 1) assign C _ i union set@(eta * a))" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.4.1"/>

                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.4.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.2">a</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and define a function <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{i+1}" text="zeta _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p29.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> so that <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{i+1}(a):=\eta(a)" text="zeta _ (i + 1) * a assign eta * a" xml:id="S6.p29.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m11.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m11.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the restriction of <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{i+1}" text="zeta _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p29.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="C\cup Z_{i}" text="C union Z _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta_{i}" text="zeta _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p30">
        <p><text font="italic">Case 3.</text>  If both <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b\not\in C\cup Z_{i}" text="list@(a, b) not-element-of C union Z _ i" xml:id="S6.p30.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-element-of" name="not-in" role="RELOP">∉</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p30.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p30.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p30.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p30.m1.2">b</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then we set</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex14">
          <Math mode="display" tex="Z_{i+1}:=Z_{i},\quad C_{i+1}:=C_{i},\quad\zeta_{i+1}:=\zeta_{i}." text="formulae@(Z _ (i + 1) assign Z _ i, formulae@(C _ (i + 1) assign C _ i, zeta _ (i + 1) assign zeta _ i))" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.1">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.1.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.1.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.1.2.2"/>

                        <XMWrap>

                            <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        </XMWrap>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p31">
        <p>Cases 1–3 are complete.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p32">
        <p>Since every equivalence class <Math mode="inline" tex="[a]_{\approx_{{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}}}" text="(delimited-[]@(a)) _ approximately-equals _ Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p32.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p32.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p32.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contains an element
of <Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S6.p32.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it follows from the definitions that while this algorithm runs over all pairs for a fixed <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell^{\prime}=1,\dots,d" text="ell ^ prime = list@(1, dots, d)" xml:id="S6.p32.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p32.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p32.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p32.m3.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p32.m3.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p32.m3.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p32.m3.3">d</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, one of the following three Cases (C1)–(C3) will occur.</p>
      </para>

      <para xml:id="S6.p34">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="|Z|\leq d-1" text="absolute-value@(Z) less= d - 1" xml:id="S6.p34.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p34.m1.1">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we can see that it is not possible for Case (C1) to occur for all
<Math mode="inline" tex="\ell^{\prime}=1,\dots,d" text="ell ^ prime = list@(1, dots, d)" xml:id="S6.p34.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p34.m2.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p34.m2.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p34.m2.3">d</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence, running this algorithm
consecutively for <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell^{\prime}=1,\dots,d" text="ell ^ prime = list@(1, dots, d)" xml:id="S6.p34.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m3.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p34.m3.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p34.m3.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p34.m3.3">d</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, results either in conclusion that the function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p34.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is unacceptable or in construction of a bijective function</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex15">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\zeta=\zeta_{i}:C\cup Z\to C_{i}\subseteq G_{\alpha}," text="zeta = zeta _ i colon C union Z to C _ i subset-of-or-equals G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.Ex15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex15.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex15.m1.1">
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="Z_{i}=Z" text="Z _ i = Z" xml:id="S6.p34.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, in which case we say that the function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p34.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <text font="italic">acceptable</text>.
Furthermore, setting <Math mode="inline" tex="T:=\zeta(C\cup Z)" text="T assign zeta * (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p34.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p34.m7.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}(\zeta(a)):={{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}(a)" text="Omega _ T * zeta * a assign Omega _ (C union Z) * a" xml:id="S6.p34.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m8.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p34.m8.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m8.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p34.m8.1">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p34.m8.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p34.m8.2">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in C\cup Z" text="a element-of C union Z" xml:id="S6.p34.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we obtain an <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S6.p34.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-admissible function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}" text="Omega _ T" xml:id="S6.p34.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on the set <Math mode="inline" tex="T\subseteq G_{\alpha}" text="T subset-of-or-equals G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p34.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p35">
        <p>Observe that the set of all such functions
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}:C\cup Z\to S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})," text="Omega _ (C union Z) colon C union Z to S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p35.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p35.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p35.m1.1">

                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">where <Math mode="inline" tex="C\subset C({\alpha},d)" text="C subset-of C * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m5.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m5.2">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="Z=\{z_{1},\dots,z_{k-|C|}\}" text="Z = set@(z _ 1, dots, z _ (k - absolute-value@(C)))" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2">…</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1">C</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, such that if <Math mode="inline" tex="T:=\zeta(C\cup Z)" text="T assign zeta * (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and if <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}:T\to S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="Omega _ T colon T to S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is the <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-admissible function, defined by
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}(\zeta(a)):={{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}(a)" text="Omega _ T * zeta * a assign Omega _ (C union Z) * a" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m10.3"/>

                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m10.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m10.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m10.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m10.2">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in C\cup Z" text="a element-of C union Z" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
