                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta(c)=c" text="zeta * c = c" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m12.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m12.1">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C" text="c element-of C" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then the two
inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqa"/>), that correspond to <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T^{\prime}}" text="Omega _ (T ^ prime)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m14">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and to <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}" text="Omega _ T" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m15">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=1" text="alpha = 1" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m16">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, or the two
inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqb"/>), that correspond to <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T^{\prime}}" text="Omega _ (T ^ prime)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m17">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and to <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}" text="Omega _ T" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m18">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=2" text="alpha = 2" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1.m19">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, are identical.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <para xml:id="S6.p36">
        <p>To prove Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemx"/>, we first establish an auxiliary lemma.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" labels="LABEL:lemy" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 6.3</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">6.3</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 6.3</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 6.3</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T^{\prime}}:T^{\prime}\to S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="Omega _ (T ^ prime) colon T ^ prime to S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is an
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-admissible function, where <Math mode="inline" tex="2\leq|T^{\prime}|\leq d" text="2 less= absolute-value@(T ^ prime) less= d" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{\prime}=E_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{r}" text="T ^ prime = E _ 1 union dots union E _ r" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a partition of <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{\prime}" text="T ^ prime" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> into equivalence classes <Math mode="inline" tex="[a]_{\approx_{{{\Omega}}_{T^{\prime}}}}" text="(delimited-[]@(a)) _ approximately-equals _ Omega _ (T ^ prime)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of the equivalence relation <Math mode="inline" tex="\approx_{{{\Omega}}_{T^{\prime}}}" text="approximately-equals _ Omega _ (T ^ prime)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
Then there are elements <Math mode="inline" tex="h_{1},\dots,h_{r}\in G_{\alpha}" text="list@(h _ 1, dots, h _ r) element-of G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m8">

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                </XMath>
              </Math> such that the set <Math mode="inline" tex="T:=E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{r}h_{r}" text="T assign E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ r * h _ r" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m9">

                <XMath>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, contains an element from the set <Math mode="inline" tex="C({\alpha},d)" text="C * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m13">

        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S6.p37">
          <p>By induction on <Math mode="inline" tex="i" text="i" xml:id="S6.p37.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq r" text="1 less= i less= r" xml:id="S6.p37.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we will prove the existence of elements
<Math mode="inline" tex="h_{1},\dots,h_{i}\in G_{\alpha}" text="list@(h _ 1, dots, h _ i) element-of G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p37.m3">

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>

                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p37.m3.2">

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p37.m3.1">…</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                  </XMApp>

              </XMath>
            </Math> with the property that the set
<Math mode="inline" tex="E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i}" text="E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i" xml:id="S6.p37.m4">
              <XMath>

                  </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has cardinality <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{j=1}^{i}|E_{j}h_{j}|" text="((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ i)@(absolute-value@(E _ j * h _ j))" xml:id="S6.p37.m5">

              </XMath>
            </Math> and every set <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{j}h_{j}" text="E _ j * h _ j" xml:id="S6.p37.m6">

            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p38">
          <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="i=1" text="i = 1" xml:id="S6.p38.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then we set <Math mode="inline" tex="h_{1}:=b^{-1}c" text="h _ 1 assign b ^ (- 1) * c" xml:id="S6.p38.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in E_{1}" text="b element-of E _ 1" xml:id="S6.p38.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C({\alpha},d)" text="c element-of C * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p38.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p38.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p38.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p38.m4.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p38.m4.2">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p39">
          <p>Making the induction hypothesis, assume that there are elements
<!--  %**** String Line 1550 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="h_{1},\dots,h_{i}\in G_{\alpha}" text="list@(h _ 1, dots, h _ i) element-of G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p39.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p39.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p39.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p39.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p39.m1.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p39.m1.1">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p39.m1.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with the desired properties.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p40">
          <p>To make the induction step from <Math mode="inline" tex="i" text="i" xml:id="S6.p40.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="i+1" text="i + 1" xml:id="S6.p40.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, denote</p>
          <equation xml:id="S6.Ex17">
            <Math mode="display" tex="C_{i}({\alpha},d):=C({\alpha},d)\cap(E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i})" text="C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d) assign C * open-interval@(alpha, d) intersection (E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i)" xml:id="S6.Ex17.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex17.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex17.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex17.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex17.m1.2">d</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex17.m1.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex17.m1.4">d</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex17.m1.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex17.m1.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and let <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in E_{i+1}" text="b element-of E _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p40.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. For an element <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C({\alpha},d)\setminus C_{i}({\alpha},d)" text="c element-of C * open-interval@(alpha, d) set-minus C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p40.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                    <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p40.m4.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p40.m4.4">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we consider the set <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}:=E_{i+1}b^{-1}c" text="R _ c assign E _ (i + 1) * b ^ (- 1) * c" xml:id="S6.p40.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Clearly, <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}" text="R _ c" xml:id="S6.p40.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> contains an element from <Math mode="inline" tex="C({\alpha},d)" text="C * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p40.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p40.m7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p40.m7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p40.m7.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p40.m7.2">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and if <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}" text="R _ c" xml:id="S6.p40.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is disjoint from <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i}" text="E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i" xml:id="S6.p40.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then we can set <Math mode="inline" tex="h_{i+1}:=b^{-1}c" text="h _ (i + 1) assign b ^ (- 1) * c" xml:id="S6.p40.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Therefore, we may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}" text="R _ c" xml:id="S6.p40.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> contains an element from <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i}" text="E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i" xml:id="S6.p40.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C({\alpha},d)\setminus C_{i}({\alpha},d)" text="c element-of C * open-interval@(alpha, d) set-minus C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p40.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>

                        <XMWrap>

                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p41">
          <p>Suppose that elements in <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i}" text="E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i" xml:id="S6.p41.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are indexed by integers from 1 to <Math mode="inline" tex="|E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i}|" text="absolute-value@(E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i)" xml:id="S6.p41.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p41.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p41.m2.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and elements in <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}=E_{i+1}b^{-1}c" text="R _ c = E _ (i + 1) * b ^ (- 1) * c" xml:id="S6.p41.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="b" text="b" xml:id="S6.p41.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="c" text="c" xml:id="S6.p41.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are chosen as above, are indexed by integers from 1 to <Math mode="inline" tex="|E_{i+1}|" text="absolute-value@(E _ (i + 1))" xml:id="S6.p41.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p41.m6.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p41.m6.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> so that, for every <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in E_{i+1}" text="e element-of E _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p41.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, the index of <Math mode="inline" tex="eb^{-1}c\in R_{c}" text="e * b ^ (- 1) * c element-of R _ c" xml:id="S6.p41.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is equal to that of <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in E_{i+1}" text="e element-of E _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p41.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus, we wish to keep indices stable when multiplying <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{i+1}" text="E _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p41.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="b^{-1}c" text="b ^ (- 1) * c" xml:id="S6.p41.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p42">
          <p>Making use of these indices, we fix an element <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in E_{i+1}" text="b element-of E _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p42.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and, for every <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C({\alpha},d)\setminus C_{i}({\alpha},d)" text="c element-of C * open-interval@(alpha, d) set-minus C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p42.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p42.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p42.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p42.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                          <XMRef idref="S6.p42.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p42.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p42.m2.4">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we consider the pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(j_{R}(c),j_{E}(c))" text="open-interval@(j _ R * c, j _ E * c)" xml:id="S6.p42.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                    <XMRef idref="S6.p42.m3.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p42.m3.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                        <XMWrap>

                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of indices <Math mode="inline" tex="j_{R}(c),j_{E}(c)" text="list@(j _ R * c, j _ E * c)" xml:id="S6.p42.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p42.m4.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p42.m4.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p42.m4.2">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}=E_{i+1}b^{-1}c" text="R _ c = E _ (i + 1) * b ^ (- 1) * c" xml:id="S6.p42.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and in <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i}" text="E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i" xml:id="S6.p42.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, resp., of an element of the intersection <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{c}\cap(E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{i}h_{i})" text="R _ c intersection (E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ i * h _ i)" xml:id="S6.p42.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p42.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p42.m7.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> which is not empty as was assumed above.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p43">
          <p>Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="(j_{R}(c_{1}),j_{E}(c_{1}))=(j_{R}(c_{2}),j_{E}(c_{2}))" text="open-interval@(j _ R * c _ 1, j _ E * c _ 1) = open-interval@(j _ R * c _ 2, j _ E * c _ 2)" xml:id="S6.p43.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m1.1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m1.1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

            </Math>. Then it follows from the definitions that if <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{1},e_{2}\in E_{i+1}" text="list@(e _ 1, e _ 2) element-of E _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S6.p43.m2">

          <p>then <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{1}=e_{2}" text="e _ 1 = e _ 2" xml:id="S6.p43.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{1}b^{-1}c_{1}=e_{2}b^{-1}c_{2}" text="e _ 1 * b ^ (- 1) * c _ 1 = e _ 2 * b ^ (- 1) * c _ 2" xml:id="S6.p43.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p43.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

              </XMath>
            </Math>. These equalities imply that <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{1}=c_{2}" text="c _ 1 = c _ 2" xml:id="S6.p43.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Therefore, for distinct elements <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{1},c_{2}\in C({\alpha},d)\setminus C_{i}({\alpha},d)" text="list@(c _ 1, c _ 2) element-of C * open-interval@(alpha, d) set-minus C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p43.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m7.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m7.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m7.2"/>

                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m7.3"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m7.3">α</XMTok>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, the pairs <Math mode="inline" tex="(j_{R}(c_{1}),j_{E}(c_{1}))" text="open-interval@(j _ R * c _ 1, j _ E * c _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p43.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m8.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m8.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m8.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m8.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m8.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m8.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="(j_{R}(c_{2}),j_{E}(c_{2}))" text="open-interval@(j _ R * c _ 2, j _ E * c _ 2)" xml:id="S6.p43.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m9.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m9.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m9.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m9.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m9.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m9.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m9.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          </XMApp>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are also distinct. However, the number of elements <Math mode="inline" tex="c" text="c" xml:id="S6.p43.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="C({\alpha},d)\setminus C_{i}({\alpha},d)" text="C * open-interval@(alpha, d) set-minus C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p43.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m11.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m11.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m11.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m11.2">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m11.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m11.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m11.3">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m11.4">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is</p>
          <equation xml:id="S6.Ex19">
            <Math mode="display" tex="|C({\alpha},d)|-|C_{i}({\alpha},d)|\geq(d^{2}+d)-d=d^{2}" text="absolute-value@(C * open-interval@(alpha, d)) - absolute-value@(C _ i * open-interval@(alpha, d)) &gt;= (d ^ 2 + d) - d = d ^ 2" xml:id="S6.Ex19.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex19.m1.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex19.m1.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                            </XMApp>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>

                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex19.m1.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex19.m1.6">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex19.m1.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex19.m1.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex19.m1.7"/>
                      <XMWrap>
