                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and the number of all such pairs <Math mode="inline" tex="(j_{R}(c),j_{E}(c))" text="open-interval@(j _ R * c, j _ E * c)" xml:id="S6.p43.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m12.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m12.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m12.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m12.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m12.1">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p43.m12.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p43.m12.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p43.m12.2">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is less than <Math mode="inline" tex="d^{2}" text="d ^ 2" xml:id="S6.p43.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. This contradiction completes the induction step and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemy"/> is proved.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemx"/>.</title>
        <para xml:id="S6.p44">
          <p>Utilizing the notation of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemy"/>, we let <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{\prime}=E_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{r}" text="T ^ prime = E _ 1 union dots union E _ r" xml:id="S6.p44.m1">

                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and let <Math mode="inline" tex="h_{1},\dots,h_{r}\in G_{\alpha}" text="list@(h _ 1, dots, h _ r) element-of G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p44.m2">

                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be elements such that the set <Math mode="inline" tex="T:=E_{1}h_{1}\cup\dots\cup E_{r}h_{r}" text="T assign E _ 1 * h _ 1 union dots union E _ r * h _ r" xml:id="S6.p44.m3">

                <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has cardinality <Math mode="inline" tex="|T|=|T^{\prime}|=k" text="absolute-value@(T) = absolute-value@(T ^ prime) = k" xml:id="S6.p44.m4">
              <XMath>

                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and every set <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{i}h_{i}" text="E _ i * h _ i" xml:id="S6.p44.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="i=1,\dots,r" text="i = list@(1, dots, r)" xml:id="S6.p44.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m6.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m6.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p44.m6.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p44.m6.2">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m6.3">r</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, contains an element from <Math mode="inline" tex="C({\alpha},d)" text="C * open-interval@(alpha, d)" xml:id="S6.p44.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m7.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m7.2">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m19.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m19.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In view of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem3t"/>, it is not difficult to see that the function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}" text="Omega _ (C union Z)" xml:id="S6.p44.m20">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is acceptable, <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta(C\cup Z)=T" text="zeta * (C union Z) = T" xml:id="S6.p44.m21">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m21.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p44.m21.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and if
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}:T\to S_{1}(V_{P}Y_{1})" text="Omega _ T colon T to S _ 1 * V _ P * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p44.m22">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m22.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p44.m22.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the function defined by
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}(\zeta(a)):={{\Omega}}_{C\cup Z}(a)" text="Omega _ T * zeta * a assign Omega _ (C union Z) * a" xml:id="S6.p44.m23">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m23.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p44.m23.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m23.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m23.1">a</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m23.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m23.2">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in C\cup Z" text="a element-of C union Z" xml:id="S6.p44.m24">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta(c)=c" text="zeta * c = c" xml:id="S6.p44.m25">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p44.m25.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p44.m25.1">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="c\in C" text="c element-of C" xml:id="S6.p44.m26">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then the following hold: <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}" text="Omega _ T" xml:id="S6.p44.m27">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S6.p44.m28">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-admissible function, <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}={\widehat{}}{{\Omega}}" text="Omega _ T = widehat@(absent) * Omega" xml:id="S6.p44.m29">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and the inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqa"/>) if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=1" text="alpha = 1" xml:id="S6.p44.m30">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> or the inequalities (<ref labelref="LABEL:inqb"/>) if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}=2" text="alpha = 2" xml:id="S6.p44.m31">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, corresponding to <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T^{\prime}}" text="Omega _ (T ^ prime)" xml:id="S6.p44.m32">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and to <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}_{T}" text="Omega _ T" xml:id="S6.p44.m33">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, are identical.
Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemx"/> is proved.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S6.p45">
        <p>To finish the proof of part (d) of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:th1"/>, we remark that, by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemx"/>, the LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]\}" text="maximum@(- conditional@(x _ s, ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)))" xml:id="S6.p45.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p45.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m1.2.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m1.2.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m1.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m1.2.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> can be effectively written down. Solving this LP-problem we obtain, by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem5"/>, the number <Math mode="inline" tex="-\sigma_{d}(Y_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})" text="- sigma _ d * Y _ 1 * bar@(r) * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p45.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m2.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m2.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="-\sigma_{d}(H_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1})" text="- sigma _ d * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p45.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m3.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m3.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemsup"/>. Since the number <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(Y_{1})={\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1})" text="bar@(r) * Y _ 1 = bar@(r) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p45.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m4.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is computable off the graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}" text="Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p45.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(Y_{1})" text="sigma _ d * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p45.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p45.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p45.m6.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is also computable.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p46">
        <p>Since the LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]\}" text="maximum@(- conditional@(x _ s, ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)))" xml:id="S6.p46.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p46.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m1.2.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m1.2.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m1.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m1.2.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> can be effectively written down, its dual problem
(<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp2"/>) can also be effectively constructed. Using the notation of the foregoing proof of parts (a)–(c), we observe that a vertex solution <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}y(d)" text="widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S6.p46.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p46.m2.1">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp2"/>) can be computed, see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="S86" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.
Hence, a combination with repetitions
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Q" text="widehat@(absent) * Q" xml:id="S6.p46.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{sol}}_{d}({\widehat{}}Q)={\widehat{}}y(d)" text="([sol] _ d)@(widehat@(absent) * Q) = widehat@(absent) * y * d" xml:id="S6.p46.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m4.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m4.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m4.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">sol</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m4.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p46.m4.1">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is also computable.
Therefore, a graph <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widehat{}}Y_{2}=\Psi(H_{2}^{*})" text="widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2 = Psi * (H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="S6.p46.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m5.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{inq}}({\widehat{}}Y_{2})={\widehat{}}Q" text="[inq]@(widehat@(absent) * Y _ 2) = widehat@(absent) * Q" xml:id="S6.p46.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p46.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p46.m6.1"><text font="sansserif">inq</text></XMText>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p46.m6.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
can be effectively constructed and the proof of part (d) is complete.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p47">
        <p>To show part (e), we note that if both groups <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{1},G_{2}" text="list@(G _ 1, G _ 2)" xml:id="S6.p47.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are finite,
then any irreducible finite <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S6.p47.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi" text="Psi" xml:id="S6.p47.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has the property that <Math mode="inline" tex="\deg u\leq\max\{|G_{1}|,|G_{2}|\}" text="degree@(u) less= maximum@(absolute-value@(G _ 1), absolute-value@(G _ 2))" xml:id="S6.p47.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m4.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m4.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p47.m4.1">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.p47.m4.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m4.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m4.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.p47.m4.3">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m4.3.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m4.3.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
for every secondary vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in V_{S}\Psi" text="u element-of V _ S * Psi" xml:id="S6.p47.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence, letting <Math mode="inline" tex="d:=\max\{|G_{1}|,|G_{2}|\}" text="d assign maximum@(absolute-value@(G _ 1), absolute-value@(G _ 2))" xml:id="S6.p47.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m6.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m6.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p47.m6.1">max</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.p47.m6.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m6.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m6.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.p47.m6.3">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m6.3.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m6.3.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we obtain <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]=\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}_{d}[Y_{1}]" text="[SLI]@(Y _ 1) = ([SLI] _ d)@(Y _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p47.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p47.m7.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m7.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m7.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m7.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m7.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m7.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so,
by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem5"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(Y_{1})=\sigma_{d}(Y_{1})" text="sigma * Y _ 1 = sigma _ d * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p47.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m8.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m8.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m8.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since the coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(Y_{1})" text="sigma _ d * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p47.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m9.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m9.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is rational and computable by part (d), the number <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(H_{1})=\sigma(Y_{1})" text="sigma * H _ 1 = sigma * Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p47.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m10.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p47.m10.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p47.m10.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is also rational and computable.
<!--  %**** String Line 1600 **** -->Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:th1"/> is proved. ∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_T2" inlist="thm theorem:T2" xml:id="ThmT2x1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 1.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 1.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 1.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}=G_{1}*G_{2}" text="F = G _ 1 * G _ 2" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the free product of two nontrivial finite groups <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{1},G_{2}" text="list@(G _ 1, G _ 2)" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a subgroup of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> given by a finite generating set <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{S}}" text="S" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of words over the alphabet
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}=G_{1}\cup G_{2}" text="A = G _ 1 union G _ 2" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then the following are true.</text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2">
        <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\rm{(a)}" text="a" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p2.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math><text font="italic"> In deterministic polynomial time of size of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{S}}" text="S" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, one can
determine whether <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is factor-free and noncyclic and, if so, one can construct an irreducible graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi_{o}(H_{1})" text="Psi _ o * H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">o</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p2.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3">
        <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\rm{(b)}" text="b" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p3.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m1.1">b</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math><text font="italic"> If <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is factor-free and noncylcic, then, in deterministic exponential time of size of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{S}}" text="S" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, one can write down and solve an LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{P}}=\max\{cx\mid Ax\leq b\}" text="P = maximum@(conditional@(c * x, A * x) less= b)" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p3.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p3.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m4.1">max</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m4.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> whose solution is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="-\sigma(H_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1})" text="- sigma * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p3.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m5.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p3.m5.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m5.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In particular, the <Math mode="inline" tex="WN" text="W * N" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(H_{1})" text="sigma * H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p3.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m7.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is computable in deterministic exponential time of size of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{S}}" text="S" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p3.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4">
        <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\rm{(c)}" text="c" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p4.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m1.1">c</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math><text font="italic"> If <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is factor-free and noncylcic, then, in deterministic double exponential time of size of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{S}}" text="S" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, one can construct an irreducible core graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Psi(H_{2}^{*})" text="Psi * (H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p4.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}^{*}" text="(H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}^{*}" text="(H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a finitely generated factor-free subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\bar{\mathrm{r}}(H_{1},H_{2}^{*})=\sigma(H_{1})\bar{\mathrm{r}}(H_{1})\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}(H_{2}^{*})" text="bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, (H _ 2) ^ *) = sigma * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * (H _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmT2x1.p4.m8.4">
