Then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}({\widehat{}}H_{1})={\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1})" text="bar@(r) * widehat@(absent) * H _ 1 = bar@(r) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p53.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p53.m12.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m12.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p53.m12.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and, by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemmap2"/>(e), <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}(H_{1})\leq\sigma_{d}({\widehat{}}H_{1})" text="sigma _ d * H _ 1 less= sigma _ d * widehat@(absent) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p53.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p53.m13.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m13.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p53.m13.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 3" text="d &gt;= 3" xml:id="S6.p53.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Consequently, <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(H_{1})\leq\sigma({\widehat{}}H_{1})" text="sigma * H _ 1 less= sigma * widehat@(absent) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p53.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p53.m15.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m15.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p53.m15.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well. This proves part (a).</p>
      </para>

By Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:th1"/>(d), the LP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{P}}({\widehat{}}H_{1},d)={\mathcal{P}}(\Psi({\widehat{}}H_{1}),d)" text="P * open-interval@(widehat@(absent) * H _ 1, d) = P * open-interval@(Psi * widehat@(absent) * H _ 1, d)" xml:id="S6.p54.m10">

            </XMath>
          </Math> can be computed, as claimed in part (b).</p>

      <para xml:id="S6.p55">
        <p>(c) We will continue to use the notation introduced above.
Suppose that all factors <Math mode="inline" tex="G_{\alpha}" text="G _ alpha" xml:id="S6.p55.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}\in I(H_{1})=\{1,\dots,m\}" text="alpha element-of I * H _ 1 = set@(1, dots, m)" xml:id="S6.p55.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m2.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m2.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p55.m2.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p55.m2.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p55.m2.3">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, are finite and <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p55.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is effectively given by its irreducible <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="S6.p55.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{1}:=\Psi(H_{1})" text="Y _ 1 assign Psi * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p55.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m5.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{core}(Y_{1})=Y_{1}" text="core@(Y _ 1) = Y _ 1" xml:id="S6.p55.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p55.m6.1">core</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m6.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (or by a finite generating set; Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:Lm1"/> reduces the latter case to the former one).
By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemsup"/>, when computing the number
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(H_{1})=\sup\tfrac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1},H_{2})}{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H%&#10;_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{2})}" text="sigma * H _ 1 = supremum@((bar@(r) * open-interval@(H _ 1, H _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 2))" xml:id="S6.p55.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m7.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m7.5">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m7.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m7.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m7.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m7.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m7.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m7.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m7.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m7.4">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
we may assume that the subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}" text="H _ 2" xml:id="S6.p55.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has property (B) and satisfies the condition <Math mode="inline" tex="I(H_{2})\subseteq I(H_{1})" text="I * H _ 2 subset-of-or-equals I * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p55.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m9.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m9.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m9.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The latter condition implies that the degree of any primary vertex of <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}:=\Psi(H_{2})" text="Y _ 2 assign Psi * H _ 2" xml:id="S6.p55.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m10.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does not exceed <Math mode="inline" tex="|I(H_{1})|" text="absolute-value@(I * H _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p55.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m11.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m11.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m11.1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m11.1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. On the other hand, the degree of every secondary vertex of
<Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p55.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does not exceed <Math mode="inline" tex="\max\{|G_{\alpha}|:{\alpha}\in I(H_{1})\}" text="maximum@(absolute-value@(G _ alpha) colon alpha element-of I * H _ 1)" xml:id="S6.p55.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m13.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m13.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p55.m13.1">max</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m13.2">
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m13.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m13.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m13.2.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m13.2.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence, the degree <Math mode="inline" tex="\deg v" text="degree@(v)" xml:id="S6.p55.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of every vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S6.p55.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="Y_{2}" text="Y _ 2" xml:id="S6.p55.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfies</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq11" xml:id="S6.E16">
          <tags>
            <tag>(6.16)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">6.16</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\deg v\leq d^{\prime}:=\max\{|I(H_{1})|,\,\max\{|G_{\alpha}|:{\alpha}\in I(H_{%&#10;1})\}\,\}." text="degree@(v) less= d ^ prime assign maximum@(absolute-value@(I * H _ 1), maximum@(absolute-value@(G _ alpha) colon alpha element-of I * H _ 1))" xml:id="S6.E16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="degree" role="OPFUNCTION">deg</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S6.E16.m1.2">max</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.1.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.1.1.1">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.2">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.2.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S6.E16.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.2.1">
                                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.2.1.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.2.1.1">
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>

                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S6.E16.m1.3.2.1.2"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.E16.m1.3.2.1.2">
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Thus, by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemsup"/>, we may conclude that

          </Math> can be written down and hence the coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d^{\prime}}({\widehat{}}H_{1})" text="sigma _ (d ^ prime) * widehat@(absent) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p55.m26">
            <XMath>

                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p55.m26.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p55.m26.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> can be computed, as desired. The proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:th3"/> is complete.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S6.p56">
      <p>In conclusion, we mention that it is not clear whether there is a duality gap between
the LSIP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(- x _ s, [SLI]@(Y _ 1)))" xml:id="S6.p56.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m1.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.p56.m1.3">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m1.3.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p56.m1.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m1.3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, introduced in Sect. 4, and its dual problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp"/>) and
it would be of interest to find this out. Another natural problem
is to find an algorithm that solves the dual problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:dlp"/>) of the LSIP-problem <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup\{-x_{s}\mid\operatorname{\textsf{SLI}}[Y_{1}]\}" text="supremum@(conditional-set@(- x _ s, [SLI]@(Y _ 1)))" xml:id="S6.p56.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m2.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.p56.m2.3">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m2.3.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMText role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.p56.m2.1"><text font="sansserif">SLI</text></XMText>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m2.3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
and thereby effectively computes the WN-coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(\Psi(H_{1}))=\sigma(H_{1})" text="sigma * Psi * H _ 1 = sigma * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p56.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m3.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Psi" role="UNKNOWN">Ψ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m3.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m3.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m3.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m3.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for a finitely generated factor-free subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p56.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the free product of two groups (and, perhaps, more than two groups) which are not necessarily finite. It would also be interesting to find an algorithm that computes the Hanna Neumann coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="\bar{\sigma}(H_{1})" text="bar@(sigma) * H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p56.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m5.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for a finitely generated factor-free noncyclic subgroup <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}" text="H _ 1" xml:id="S6.p56.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the free product <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S6.p56.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of two finite groups which is defined as
<Math mode="inline" tex="\bar{\sigma}(H_{1}):=\sup\tfrac{{\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1}\cap H_{2})}{{\bar{%&#10;\mathrm{r}}}(H_{1}){\bar{\mathrm{r}}}(H_{2})}" text="bar@(sigma) * H _ 1 assign supremum@((bar@(r) * (H _ 1 intersection H _ 2)) / (bar@(r) * H _ 1 * bar@(r) * H _ 2))" xml:id="S6.p56.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m8.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m8.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m8.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m8.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m8.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p56.m8.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p56.m8.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
over all finitely generated factor-free noncyclic subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{2}" text="H _ 2" xml:id="S6.p56.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{F}}" text="F" xml:id="S6.p56.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
